    Type=simple
    User=root
    Group=root

    Restart=always
    
    [Install]
    WantedBy=multi-user.target

A(游客进行投诉) --> B(旅游投诉受理员接受投诉和相关信息)
B --> C(按分管领导的指示进行处理)
C --> D(立即与相关部门负责人对接)
D --> E(协调部门或职能部门办理)
E --> F(对游客进行回访并补充完善登记信息)
F --> G(投诉办进行满意度回访)
G --> H(考核并整改提升服务水平)

H --> A

title: Rule for detecting malicious Perl scripts
priority: 10
type: Single  
category: suspicious

condition:
  and:
    - match(".*Perl scripts.*")
    - match(".*process is created.*")
    - or:
      - net_tcp_keepalive
      - number_of_files gt 3

action:
  - quarantine(0)
  - notify

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: mypod
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx
    volumeMounts:
    - name: nginx-config
      mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
  volumes:
  - name: nginx-config
    configMap:
      name: my-configmap
      items:
      - key: nginx.conf
        path: nginx.conf

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      volumes:
        - name: nginx-volume
          configMap:
            name: my-configmap
      containers:
        - name: nginx
          image: nginx:latest
          volumeMounts:
            - name: nginx-volume
              mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
              subPath: nginx.conf

apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-reader
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: nginx-sidecar
          image: nginx:latest
          volumeMounts:
            - name: config-volume
              mountPath: /data/nginx.conf
      volumes:
        - name: config-volume
          configMap:
            name: nginx-config
---

end
hold off

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
        role: slave
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: mysql
        image: mysql:5.7
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: example
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - name: mysql-data
          mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: mysql-read
spec:
  selector:
    app: mysql
    role: slave
  ports:
  - name: mysql
    port: 3306
    targetPort: 3306
---
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-master
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
      role: master
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
        role: master
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: mysql
        image: mysql:5.7

graph TD

A(CFileManager Constructor) --> B(SendDriveList)
B -.-> C(Manage files in a new thread)

CFileManager_onReceive --> D(Switch statement based on lpBuffer[0])

D --> E(COMMAND_LIST_FILES: SendFilesList)
D --> F(COMMAND_DELETE_FILE: DeleteFile, SendToken)
D --> G(COMMAND_DELETE_DIRECTORY: DeleteDirectory, SendToken)
D --> H(COMMAND_DOWN_FILES: UploadToRemote)
D --> I(COMMAND_CONTINUE: SendFileData)
D --> J(COMMAND_CREATE_FOLDER: CreateFolder, SendToken)
D --> K(COMMAND_RENAME_FILE: Rename, SendToken)
D --> L(COMMAND_STOP: StopTransfer, SendToken)
D --> M(COMMAND_SET_TRANSFER_MODE: SetTransferMode)
D --> N(COMMAND_FILE_SIZE: CreateLocalRecvFile)
D --> O(COMMAND_FILE_DATA: WriteLocalRecvFile)
D --> P(COMMAND_OPEN_FILE_SHOW: OpenFile with SW_SHOW)
D --> Q(COMMAND_OPEN_FILE_HIDE: OpenFile with SW_HIDE)

E -.- F -.- G -.- H -.- I -.- J -.- K -.- L -.- M -.- N -.- O -.- P -.- Q -.-> R(End of switch statement)

sequenceDiagram
    participant 用户
    participant CSystemManager
    participant IOCPClient
    participant 系统
    用户->>+CSystemManager: 构造函数
    CSystemManager->>+系统: 获取进程列表
    系统-->>-CSystemManager: 返回进程列表数据
    CSystemManager->>+IOCPClient: 发送进程列表
    IOCPClient-->>-CSystemManager: 完成发送
    CSystemManager->>+系统: 获取窗口列表
    系统-->>-CSystemManager: 返回窗口列表数据
    CSystemManager->>+IOCPClient: 发送窗口列表
    IOCPClient-->>-CSystemManager: 完成发送
    用户->>+CSystemManager: 操作请求
    CSystemManager->>+系统: 执行操作
    系统-->>-CSystemManager: 结果
    CSystemManager->>+用户: 返回操作结果
    用户->>-CSystemManager: 析构函数

% Jogador 2 joga com o algoritmo A*
jogador2_joga(Tabuleiro) :-
    versao(Versao),
    largura(Largura),
    altura(Altura),

    (Versao =:= 1) ->
    % Realiza uma jogada astar
    jogada_astar(Tabuleiro, Linha, Coluna),
    write('Jogador 2 escolheu coluna: '), write(Coluna), nl,
    write('Jogador 2 escolheu linha: '), write(Linha), nl,

    criar_tabuleiro(NovoTabuleiro),
    troca(NovoTabuleiro, Linha, Coluna, TabuleiroMod, 'O'),
    imprimir_tabuleiro(TabuleiroMod),
    jogador1_joga(TabuleiroMod)
    ;
    (Versao =:= 2) ->
    write('Versão nao implementada'), nl.

% Função para realizar uma jogada usando A* busca
jogada_astar(Tabuleiro, Linha, Coluna) :-
    inicializar_tabela_heuristica(Tabuleiro, TabelaHeuristica),
    calcular_heuristica_tabuleiro(Tabuleiro, TabelaHeuristica, NovaTabelaHeuristica),
    menor_valor_tabela_heuristica(NovaTabelaHeuristica, MenorValor, Linha, Coluna).

% Implemente as funções: inicializar_tabela_heuristica, calcular_heuristica_tabuleiro e menor_valor_tabela_heuristica.

graph TD
A(开始) --> B(枚举进程)
B --> C(得到进程处理句柄)
C --> D(得到进程完整路径)
D --> E(计算数据结构大小并分配缓冲区)
E --> F(向缓冲区存放数据)
F --> B
B --> G(结束枚举)
G --> H(将缓冲区作为返回值返回)
H --> I(结束)

graph LR
A(客户端请求文件管理服务) --> B(服务器响应请求，发送驱动器列表)
B --> C(客户端接收驱动器列表并显示)
C --> D{客户端选择操作}
D --上传,下载,删除,重命名等--> E(发送相应命令)
E --> F(服务器收到命令并执行)
F --> G{需要返回数据?}
G --是--> H(发送给客户端)
G --否--> J(结束)
H --> I(客户端接收数据并处理)
I --> D

% Fakty określające drzwi między pokojami
drzwi(a, b).
drzwi(b, c).
drzwi(b, d).
drzwi(d, e).
drzwi(c, f).

% Fakty określające gdzie znajdują się klucze
klucz(e, kluczE).

% Fakty określające, które klucze otwierają które drzwi
otwiera(c, kluczE).

% Reguła do wydrukowania komunikatu przechodzenia między pokojami
przechodze(P1, P2) :- 
    format('[przechodze_z, ~w, do, ~w]~n', [P1, P2]).

% Reguła do wydrukowania komunikatu opuszczania pomieszczenia
wychodze(P) :-
    format('[wychodze_z, ~w]~n', [P]).

% Reguła do wydrukowania komunikatu znalezienie klucza
znalazlem_klucz(K) :-
    format('[znalazlem_klucz, ~w]~n', [K]).

% Reguła do sprawdzania czy klucz jest w obecnym pokoju
znajduje_klucz_w_pokoju(Pokoj, Klucz) :-
    klucz(Pokoj, Klucz),
    znalazlem_klucz(Klucz).

% Reguła do sprawdzania czy drzwi są otwarte przez klucz
drzwi_otwarte(Pokoj, Klucz) :-
    otwiera(Pokoj, Klucz).

% Reguła do szukania wyjścia z pomieszczenia
szukaj_wyjscia(Pokoj, _, Klucz, Pokoj) :-
    drzwi_otwarte(Pokoj, Klucz), !.
szukaj_wyjscia(Pokoj, Pokoj_z_kluczem, Klucz, Pokoj_z_wyjsciem) :-
    (klucz(Pokoj, Klucz)
    ->  Pokoj_z_kluczem = Pokoj
    ;   true),
    drzwi(Pokoj, Pokoj_sasiad),
    przechodze(Pokoj, Pokoj_sasiad),
    szukaj_wyjscia(Pokoj_sasiad, Pokoj_z_kluczem, Klucz, Pokoj_z_wyjsciem),
    wychodze(Pokoj_sasiad).

- name: Extract tar.gz archive
  unarchive:

  register: extract_result

- name: Copy and extract tar.gz archive
  copy:
    src: /path/to/archive.tar.gz
    dest: /path/to/extracted
  args:
    executable: /bin/tar # указание пути к исполняемому файлу tar на удаленной машине
  register: extract_result

% Definiujemy bazy danych opisujące drzwi pomiędzy pokojami, klucze w pokojach i jakie drzwi otwierają
drzwi(salon, kuchnia).
drzwi(salon, oranzeria).
drzwi(kuchnia, sypialnia).
drzwi(korytarz, piwnica).
drzwi(ubikacja, piwnica).
drzwi(korytarz, ubikacja).
drzwi(kuchnia, korytarz).
drzwi(oranzeria, lazienka).
klucz(lazienka, klucz_duzy).
klucz(oranzeria, klucz_maly).
klucz(korytarz, klucz_z_sercem).
otwiera(ubikacja, klucz_maly).
otwiera(oranzeria, klucz_z_sercem).

% Definujemy regułę szukaj_wyjscia wg opisu
szukaj_wyjscia(Start, POKOJ_Z_KLUCZEM, KLUCZ, POKOJ_Z_WYJSCIEM) :-
    szukaj(Start, [], POKOJ_Z_KLUCZEM, KLUCZ, POKOJ_Z_WYJSCIEM).

szukaj(POKOJ_POCZATKOWY, Odwiedzone, POKOJ_Z_KLUCZEM, KLUCZ, POKOJ_Z_WYJSCIEM) :-
    drzwi(POKOJ_POCZATKOWY, NowyPokoj),
    \+ member(NowyPokoj, Odwiedzone),
    format('[przechodze_z, ~w, do, ~w]~n', [POKOJ_POCZATKOWY, NowyPokoj]),
    (klucz(NowyPokoj, ZnalezionyKlucz) ->
        (format('[znalazlem_klucz, ~w]~n', [ZnalezionyKlucz]),
         (otwiera(POKOJ_Z_WYJSCIEM, ZnalezionyKlucz) ->
            format('[znalazlem_wyjscie]~n'),
            POKOJ_Z_KLUCZEM = NowyPokoj,
            KLUCZ = ZnalezionyKlucz,
            !
         ;
            szukaj(NowyPokoj, [POKOJ_POCZATKOWY|Odwiedzone], POKOJ_Z_KLUCZEM, KLUCZ, POKOJ_Z_WYJSCIEM)
         ))
    ;
        szukaj(NowyPokoj, [POKOJ_POCZATKOWY|Odwiedzone], POKOJ_Z_KLUCZEM, KLUCZ, POKOJ_Z_WYJSCIEM)
    ),
    !
;
   (member(POKOJ_POCZATKOWY, Odwiedzone) ->
        format('[wychodze_z, ~w]~n', [POKOJ_POCZATKOWY])
    ;   true
   ).

% Definiowanie faktów

drzwi(salon,kuchnia).
drzwi(salon,oranzeria).
drzwi(kuchnia,sypialnia).
drzwi(korytarz,piwnica).
drzwi(ubikacja,piwnica).
drzwi(korytarz,ubikacja).
drzwi(kuchnia,korytarz).
drzwi(oranzeria,lazienka).
klucz(lazienka,klucz_duzy).
klucz(oranzeria,klucz_maly).
klucz(korytarz,klucz_z_sercem).
otwiera(ubikacja,klucz_maly).
otwiera(oranzeria,klucz_z_sercem).

% Szukanie wyjścia

szukaj_wyjscia(StartRoom, KeyRoom, ProperKey, ExitRoom) :-
    explore(StartRoom, [], KeyRoom, ProperKey, ExitRoom).

% Przeglądanie pokoju

explore(CurrentRoom, VisitedRooms, KeyRoom, ProperKey, ExitRoom) :-
    (otwiera(CurrentRoom, ProperKey) ->
        writeln([znalazlem_wyjscie]),
        KeyRoom = VisitedRooms,
        ExitRoom = CurrentRoom
    ;
        drzwi(CurrentRoom, NextRoom),
        not(member(NextRoom, VisitedRooms)),
        writeln([przechodze_z, CurrentRoom, do, NextRoom]),
        (klucz(NextRoom, Key) ->
            writeln([znalazlem_klucz, Key]),
            explore(NextRoom, [CurrentRoom|VisitedRooms], KeyRoom, Key, ExitRoom)
        ;
            explore(NextRoom, [CurrentRoom|VisitedRooms], KeyRoom, ProperKey, ExitRoom)
        ),
        writeln([wychodze_z, CurrentRoom])
    ).

zoom = zoom * dz
local dx = camera_x - center_x
local dy = camera_y - center_y
local dist = math.sqrt(dx^2 + dy^2)
local newdist = dist * zoom
camera_x = center_x + dx * (newdist / dist)
camera_y = center_y + dy * (newdist / dist)

-- Update the camera system with new position and zoom level
camera:setPosition(camera_x, camera_y)
camera:setZoom(zoom)

    image: traefik:v2.4

    command:
      - "--log.level=INFO"
      - "--providers.docker=true"
      - "--providers.docker.exposedbydefault=false"
      - "--entrypoints.web.address=:80"
      - "--entrypoints.websecure.address=:443"
      - "--certificatesresolvers.myresolver.acme.httpchallenge=true"
      - "--certificatesresolvers.myresolver.acme.httpchallenge.entrypoint=web"
      - "--certificatesresolvers.myresolver.acme.email=youremail@mail.com"
      - "--certificatesresolvers.myresolver.acme.storage=/letsencrypt/acme.json"

      - 443:443

      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock:ro

    container_name: overseerr
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=your_timezone

      - traefik.enable=true

      - traefik.http.routers.overseerr.entrypoints=websecure
      - traefik.http.routers.overseerr.tls=true
      - traefik.http.routers.overseerr.tls.certresolver=myresolver
      - traefik.http.services.overseerr.loadbalancer.server.port=5055

      - "--certificatesresolvers.myresolver.acme.httpchallenge=true"
      - "--certificatesresolvers.myresolver.acme.httpchallenge.entrypoint=web"
      - "--certificatesresolvers.myresolver.acme.email=youremail@mail.com"
      - "--certificatesresolvers.myresolver.acme.storage=/letsencrypt/acme.json"
    ports:
      - 80:80
      - 443:443
    volumes:
      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock:ro
      - letsencrypt:/letsencrypt

  notifiarr:
    image: golift/notifiarr:latest
    container_name: notifiarr
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=your_timezone
    command: -config /config/notifiarr.config.example.yml
    labels:
      - traefik.enable=true
      - traefik.http.routers.notifiarr.rule=Host(`notifiarr.your-domain.com`)
      - traefik.http.routers.notifiarr.entrypoints=websecure
      - traefik.http.routers.notifiarr.tls=true
      - traefik.http.routers.notifiarr.tls.certresolver=myresolver
      - traefik.http.services.notifiarr.loadbalancer.server.port=80
    volumes:
      - notifiarr-data:/config

version: '3.7'

services:
  traefik:
    image: traefik:v2.4
    container_name: traefik
    command:
      - "--log.level=INFO"
      - "--providers.docker=true"
      - "--providers.docker.exposedbydefault=false"

      # Entrypoints para HTTP y HTTPS
      - "--entrypoints.web.address=:80"
      - "--entrypoints.websecure.address=:443"
      - "--entrypoints.tcpenrry.address=:8000" # TCP entrypoint
      - "--entrypoints.udpentry.address=:9000/udp" # UDP entrypoint

      - "--certificatesresolvers.myresolver.acme.httpchallenge=true"
      - "--certificatesresolvers.myresolver.acme.httpchallenge.entrypoint=web"
      - "--certificatesresolvers.myresolver.acme.email=youremail@mail.com"
      - "--certificatesresolvers.myresolver.acme.storage=/letsencrypt/acme.json"
      
    ports:
      - 80:80
      - 443:443
      - 8000:8000 # Añadido para el tráfico TCP
      - 9000:9000/udp # Añadido para el tráfico UDP
    volumes:
      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock:ro
      - ./letsencrypt:/letsencrypt

  # Otros servicios aquí (ejemplo, Notifiarr)

  tcp_service:
    image: your_custom_tcp_service_image
    container_name: tcp_service
    labels:
      - traefik.enable=true
      - traefik.tcp.routers.tcp_rule.rule=HostSNI(`*`)
      - traefik.tcp.routers.tcp_rule.entrypoints=tcpenrry
      - traefik.tcp.routers.tcp_rule.service=tcp_service
      - traefik.tcp.services.tcp_service.loadbalancer.server.port=8001

  udp_service:
    image: your_custom_udp_service_image
    container_name: udp_service
    labels:
      - traefik.enable=true
      - traefik.udp.routers.udp_rule.entrypoints=udpentry
      - traefik.udp.routers.udp_rule.service=udp_service
      - traefik.udp.services.udp_service.loadbalancer.server.port=9001

nombresDeUsuarios :: RedSocial -> [String]
nombresDeUsuarios ([], _, _) = []
nombresDeUsuarios (u:us, r, q) = nub (nombresDeUsuariosHelper (u:us))

nombresDeUsuariosHelper :: [(String, String)] -> [String]
nombresDeUsuariosHelper [] = []
nombresDeUsuariosHelper (u:us)
    | snd u `elem` nombresDeUsuariosHelper us = nombresDeUsuariosHelper us
    | otherwise = snd u : nombresDeUsuariosHelper us

nub :: Eq a => [a] -> [a]
nub [] = []
nub (x:xs) = x : nub (filter (/= x) xs)

type User = String
type Relation = (User, User)

-- Check for a path of relations between two users of a minimum length
isRelatedWithMaxLength :: Int -> User -> User -> [Relation] -> Bool
isRelatedWithMaxLength _ _ _ [] = False
isRelatedWithMaxLength maxLength start end relations
    | maxLength <= 0 = False
    | start == end = True
    | otherwise = any (\(_,u2) -> isRelatedWithMaxLength (maxLength-1) u2 end (removeRelation relations)) relatedRelations
    where relatedRelations = filter (\(u1, _) -> u1 == start) relations
          removeRelation = filter (\(u1, u2) -> u1 /= start || u2 /= end)

-- Check if there is a related path of at least 4 users between the start and end users
isRelated :: User -> User -> [Relation] -> Bool
isRelated start end relations = isRelatedWithMaxLength (3::Int) start end relations

main :: IO ()
main = do
    let relations = [("user1", "user2"), ("user8", "user3"), ("user2", "user3"), ("user3", "user4")]
    print (isRelated "user1" "user4" relations) -- True
    print (isRelated "user8" "user1" relations) -- False

% 定义信号参数
fsum = 8000; % 抽样频率
t = linspace(0,1,fsum); % 时间范围
k = 0:fsum-1; % 离散时间序列

% 定义正弦信号
f0 = [2000 2200 2400 2600 7200 7400 7600 7800]; % 不同频率
x = []; % 初始化正弦序列
for i = 1:length(f0)
    x_i = sin(2*pi*f0(i)*t); % 生成正弦波
    sound(x_i,fsum); pause(1); % 播放声音
    x = [x; x_i]; % 拼接正弦序列
end

% 将正弦序列转换为离散序列
f0_d = f0 / fsum; % 将 f0 转换为离散频率
x_d = sin(2*pi*f0_d.'*k); % 生成离散正弦序列

  - intent: choose_path

  - intent: ask_question

language: es
pipeline:
  - name: WhitespaceTokenizer
  - name: RegexFeaturizer
  - name: LexicalSyntacticFeaturizer
  - name: CountVectorsFeaturizer
  - name: CountVectorsFeaturizer
    analyzer: "char_wb"
    min_ngram: 1
    max_ngram: 4
  - name: DIETClassifier
    epochs: 100
  - name: EntitySynonymMapper
  - name: ResponseSelector
    epochs: 100
  - name: FallbackClassifier
    threshold: 0.3
    ambiguity_threshold: 0.1

policies:
  - name: MemoizationPolicy
  - name: TEDPolicy
    max_history: 5
    epochs: 100
  - name: RulePolicy

    - intent: goodbye

---
- name: Install necessary packages and update the system
  hosts: oraclelinux8
  become: yes
  tasks:
    - name: Install necessary packages
      dnf:
        name: ['vim', 'wget', 'net-tools']
        state: present
    - name: Upgrade all packages
      dnf:
        name: "*"
        state: latest

---
- name: Configure Firewall
  hosts: oraclelinux8
  become: yes
  tasks:
    - name: Install FirewallD
      dnf:
        name: firewalld
        state: present

    - name: Enable and start FirewallD
      systemd:
        name: firewalld
        state: started
        enabled: yes

    - name: Add necessary Firewall rules
      firewalld:
        service: "{{ item }}"
        permanent: yes
        state: enabled
        immediate: yes
        zone: public
      loop:
        - http
        - https
        - ssh

---
- name: Configure and secure SSH
  hosts: oraclelinux8
  become: yes
  vars:
    allowed_users: 'user1,user2,user3'

  tasks:
    - name: Install OpenSSH server
      dnf:
        name: openssh-server
        state: present

    - name: Configure SSH settings
      lineinfile:
        path: /etc/ssh/sshd_config
        regexp: "{{ line.key }}"
        line: "{{ line.key }} {{ line.value }}"
      loop:
        - { key: 'PermitRootLogin', value: 'no' }
        - { key: 'PubkeyAuthentication', value: 'yes' }
        - { key: 'PasswordAuthentication', value: 'no' }
        - { key: 'AllowUsers', value: "{{ allowed_users }}" }

    - name: Restart SSH service
      systemd:
        name: sshd
        state: restarted

---
- name: Set up NTP
  hosts: oraclelinux8
  become: yes
  tasks:
    - name: Install Chrony
      dnf:
        name: chrony
        state: present

    - name: Configure NTP settings
      lineinfile:
        path: /etc/chrony.conf
        regexp: "{{ line.key }}"
        line: "{{ line.key }} {{ line.value }}"
      loop:
        - { key: 'pool', value: '2.oracle.pool.ntp.org iburst' }

    - name: Enable and start Chronyd
      systemd:
        name: chronyd.service
        state: started
        enabled: yes

---
- name: Add new user and set up passwordless SSH
  hosts: oraclelinux8
  become: yes
  vars:
    remote_user: 'newuser'
    public_key: 'ssh-rsa ...insert_your_ssh_public_key_here...'

  tasks:
    - name: Create new user
      user:
        name: "{{ remote_user }}"
        create_home: yes
        state: present

    - name: Set up authorized_keys for new user
      authorized_key:
        user: "{{ remote_user }}"
        key: "{{ public_key }}"

for i = 1:size(points,2)
    pause(0.01)
    bx = points(1,i);
    by = points(2,i);
    bz = points(3,i);
    tform = rpy2tr(136,-180,-180); %欧拉角转换为齐次变换矩阵
    targetPos = [bx by bz]; %设置机器人末端的位置
    TR = transl(targetPos) * tform; %将末端位置转换为齐次变换矩阵
    hold on
    grid on
    figure(2)
    plot3(bx,by,bz,'*','LineWidth',1);
    hold on
    axis([-1 1.2 -1 1.2 -0.5 1])
    q = robot1.ikine(TR); %逆解得到机器人各关节角度
    robot1.plot(q); %绘制机器人运动轨迹
end

% Recursive friends rule
friends(A, B) :- friend(A, B).
friends(A, B) :- friend(A, C), friends(C, B).

prefers(pat, comedy).
prefers(sean, adventure).
prefers(dale, _).
prefers(lee, Genre) :- \+ prefers(sean, Genre).
prefers(myrna, thriller).
prefers(spike, Genre, Year) :- Year >= 2000.
prefers(chris, comedy, Year) :- Year >= 1980, Year < 1990.

movie_genre(shrek, animation).
movie_genre(theShining, horror).
% ... add more here

movie_year(shrek, 2001).
movie_year(theShining, 1980).
% ... add more here

% Base case
suitable_movie(Person, Movie) :-
    movie_genre(Movie, Genre),
    movie_year(Movie, Year),
    prefers(Person, Genre),
    prefers(Person, Genre, Year).

% Recursive case
suitable_movie(Person, Movie) :-
    friends(Person, Friend),
    suitable_movie(Friend, Movie).

% Suggest predicate
suggest(Person, Movie) :-
    suitable_movie(Person, Movie),
    \+ (friends(Person, Friend), \+ suitable_movie(Friend, Movie)).

% Base case
suitable_movie(Person, Movie) :-
    movie_genre(Movie, Genre),
    movie_year(Movie, Year),
    (prefers(Person, Genre); prefers(Person, _, Year)).

% Recursive case
suitable_movie(Person, Movie) :-
    friends(Person, Friend),
    suitable_movie(Friend, Movie).

% Suggest predicate
suggest(Person, Movie) :-
    suitable_movie(Person, Movie),
    \+ (friends(Person, Friend), \+ suitable_movie(Friend, Movie)).

friend(pat, chris).
friend(myrna, sean).

% Recursive friends rule
friends(A, B) :- friend(A, B).
friends(A, B) :- friend(A, X), friends(X, B).

wants(lee, different_than(sean)).

openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Sample API
  description: A sample API documentation using Swagger and Node.js

servers:
  - url: http://localhost:3000
    description: Local development server

paths:
  /:
    get:
      summary: Get hello message
      operationId: getHelloMessage
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: Hello World!

# 声明变量
CC = gcc
CFLAGS = -Wall
LIBS = -lm

# 声明目标和依赖关系
TARGET = program
SRCS = main.c utils.c
OBJS = $(SRCS:.c=.o)

# 声明规则
all: $(TARGET)

$(TARGET): $(OBJS)
    $(CC) $(CFLAGS) $(OBJS) $(LIBS) -o $@

%.o: %.c
    $(CC) $(CFLAGS) -c $< -o $@

clean:
    rm -f $(OBJS) $(TARGET)

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nginx
        image: nginx:1.19.2
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

# Nom du pipeline
name: C# Solution with TypeScript Application Analysis

# Ressources requises
resources:
  repositories:
    - repository: self
      # Nom du repo
      name: MyProject
      # Type de connexion au repo
      connection: 'MyProjectConnection'
      # Configuration du repo
      type: git
      # Branche par défaut
      ref: main

# Étapes du pipeline
stages:
  # Compilation du code
  - stage: Build
    displayName: Build
    jobs:
      - job: BuildJob
        steps:
          # Checkout du code source
          - checkout: self

          # Installation des dépendances
          - task: DotNetCoreCLI@2
            displayName: 'Restore NuGet Packages'
            inputs:
              command: 'restore'
              projects: '**/*.csproj'
              feedsToUse: 'config'
              nugetConfigPath: 'nuget.config'

          # Compilation des projets
          - task: DotNetCoreCLI@2
            displayName: 'Build Projects'
            inputs:
              command: 'build'
              projects: '**/*.csproj'
              arguments: '--configuration $(BuildConfiguration)'

  # Analyse SonarQube du code
  - stage: Analysis
    displayName: Analysis
    dependsOn: Build
    variables:
      # URL de votre instance SonarQube
      BUILD_SONAR_HOST_URL: 'http://localhost:9000'
      # Nom du projet dans SonarQube
      BUILD_SONAR_PROJECT_NAME: 'MyProject'
      # Clé du projet dans SonarQube
      BUILD_SONAR_PROJECT_KEY: 'myproject'
      # Version du code analysé
      BUILD_SONAR_PROJECT_VERSION: '$(build.buildNumber)'
    jobs:
      - job: SonarQubeAnalysisJob
        # Définition des VM et de l'image utilisée (Ubuntu 16.04 par exemple)
        pool:
          vmImage: 'ubuntu-16.04'
        steps:
          # Installation du wrapper SonarQube
          - task: SonarCloudPrepare@1
            inputs:
              SonarCloud: 'SonarQube'
              organization: 'myorganization'
              scannerMode: 'CLI'
              configMode: 'manual'
              cliProjectKey: '$(BUILD_SONAR_PROJECT_KEY)'
              cliProjectName: '$(BUILD_SONAR_PROJECT_NAME)'
              cliProjectVersion: '$(BUILD_SONAR_PROJECT_VERSION)'
              extraProperties: |
                sonar.exclusions=**/bin/**/*,**/obj/**/*
                sonar.cs.opencover.reportsPaths=**/TestResults/**/coverage.opencover.xml

          # Build du code pour l'analyse SonarQube
          - task: DotNetCoreCLI@2
            displayName: 'Build Projects (for SonarQube Analysis)'
            inputs:
              command: 'build'
              projects: '**/*.csproj'
              arguments: '--configuration $(BuildConfiguration)'

          # Analyse SonarQube du code C#
          - task: SonarCloudAnalyze@1

          # Publication des résultats SonarQube
          - task: SonarCloudPublish@1
            inputs:
              pollingTimeoutSec: '300'

  # Déploiement de l'application
  - stage: Deploy
    displayName: Deploy
    dependsOn: Analysis
    jobs:
      - job: DeployJob
        # Définition des VM et de l'image utilisée (Windows Server 2019 par exemple)
        pool:
          vmImage: 'windows-latest'
        steps:
          # Déploiement de l'application TypeScript
          - task: NodeTool@0
            inputs:
              versionSpec: '14.x'
            displayName: 'Install Node.js'

          # Installation des dépendances TypeScript
          - task: Npm@1
            displayName: 'Install TypeScript Dependencies'
            inputs:
              command: 'install'
              workingDir: '$(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)/MyProject/MyTypeScriptApp'
              verbose: False

          # Compilation de l'application TypeScript
          - task: Npm@1
            displayName: 'Build TypeScript Application'
            inputs:
              command: 'run'
              workingDir: '$(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)/MyProject/MyTypeScriptApp'
              verbose: False
              arguments: 'build'

          # Déploiement de l'application C# sur un environnement de préproduction
          - task: DeployWebApp@1
            displayName: 'Deploy C# App to Pre-Production Environment'
            inputs:
              azureSubscription: 'MyAzureSubscription'
              appName: 'my-preprod-app'
              package: '$(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)/MyProject/MyCSharpApp/bin/$(BuildConfiguration)/publish'
              appOffline: True
              renameFilesFlag: True

FROM node:18

% Declare the dynamic predicate to store user preferences for drink properties
:- dynamic preferred_property/1.

% Define facts that specify different drinks with their properties
drink(vodka_cranberry, [vodka, cranberry_juice, sweet]).
drink(margarita, [tequila, lime_juice, triple_sec, sour]).
drink(scotch, [scotch, water]).
drink(pina_colada, [rum, pineapple_juice, coconut_cream, sweet]).

% Define a predicate to recommend drinks to a user based on their preferred properties
recommend_drinks :- 
    % Ask the user which properties they prefer
    write('Which properties do you like in drinks?'), nl,
    write('vodka, tequila, rum, gin, scotch, cranberry, lime, pine_apple, coconut, sour, sweet, bitter, water, triple_sec?'), nl,
    read(PrefProp),
    % Add the user preference to the dynamic predicate
    assert(preferred_property(PrefProp)),
    % Recall all the drinks that match the user's preferred properties
    findall(Drink, (drink(Drink, Props), member(PrefProp, Props)), MatchingDrinks),
    % Display the matching drinks to the user
    display_drinks(MatchingDrinks).

% Define a predicate to display a list of recommended drinks to the user
display_drinks([]) :- 
    write('Sorry, no drinks were found that match your preferences.').
display_drinks(MatchingDrinks) :- 
    write('Based on your preferences, we would recommend the following drinks:'), nl,
    display_drinks_helper(MatchingDrinks).
display_drinks_helper([]).
display_drinks_helper([Drink|RestMatchingDrinks]) :- 
    write('- '), write(Drink), nl,
    display_drinks_helper(RestMatchingDrinks).

% Declare the dynamic predicate to store user preferences for taste properties
:- dynamic preferred_taste_property/1.

% Define facts that specify different drinks with their taste properties
drink(vodka_cranberry, [sweet, sour, fruity]).
drink(margarita, [sour, tangy, citrus]).
drink(scotch, [smoky, peaty, strong]).
drink(pina_colada, [sweet, creamy, pineapple, coconut]).

% Define a predicate to recommend drinks to a user based on their preferred taste properties
recommend_drinks :- 
    % Ask the user which taste properties they prefer
    write('Which taste properties do you like in drinks?'), nl,
    write('[sweet, sour, fruity, bitter, smoky, peaty, strong, creamy, citrus, tangy, pineapple, coconut]?'), nl,
    read(TasteProp),
    % Add the user preference to the dynamic predicate
    assert(preferred_taste_property(TasteProp)),
    % Recall all the drinks that match the user's preferred taste properties
    findall(Drink, (drink(Drink, Props), member(TasteProp, Props)), MatchingDrinks),
    % Display the matching drinks to the user
    display_drinks(MatchingDrinks).

% Define a predicate to display a list of recommended drinks to the user
display_drinks([]) :- 
    write('Sorry, no drinks were found that match your preferences.').
display_drinks(MatchingDrinks) :- 
    write('Based on your preferences, we would recommend the following drinks:'), nl,
    display_drinks_helper(MatchingDrinks).
display_drinks_helper([]).
display_drinks_helper([Drink|RestMatchingDrinks]) :- 
    write('- '), write(Drink), nl,
    display_drinks_helper(RestMatchingDrinks).

movie_genre(shrek, animation).
movie_genre(the_shining, horror).
movie_genre(deadpool, comedy).
movie_genre(the_avengers, adventure).
movie_genre(memento, thriller).

% You can add more movie_genres here

movie_year(shrek, 2001).
movie_year(the_shining, 1980).
movie_year(deadpool, 2016).
movie_year(the_avengers, 2012).
movie_year(memento, 2000).

% You can add more movie_years here

% ok_with(X, Movie) checks if person X is okay with the movie's genre
ok_with(X, Movie) :- wants(X, G), movie_genre(Movie, G).
ok_with(dale, Movie).
ok_with(sean, Movie) :- wants(sean, G), movie_genre(Movie, G); movie_genre(Movie, horror).
ok_with(lee, Movie) :- wants(lee, different_than_sean), not(ok_with(sean, Movie)).
ok_with(spike, Movie) :- wants(spike, this_century), movie_year(Movie, Y), Y >= 2000.
ok_with(chris, Movie) :- wants(chris, comedy_1980s), movie_genre(Movie, G), G == comedy, movie_year(Movie, Y), Y >= 1980, Y < 1990.

% suggest(Person, Movie) finds movies corresponding to everyone in FriendNetwork's preferences
suggest(Person, Movie) :-
    setof(X, (friends(Person, X) ; friends(X, Person)), FriendNetwork),
    % Get extended friend network
    findall(Y, (member(X, FriendNetwork), (friends(X, Y) ; friends(Y, X))), ExtendedNetwork),
    append(FriendNetwork, ExtendedNetwork, AllNetwork),
    list_to_set(AllNetwork, NoDuplicates),
    % Check if movie is okay for everyone
    ok_with(Person, Movie),
    forall(member(F, NoDuplicates), ok_with(F, Movie)).

% list_to_set(List, Set) removes duplicates from a list
list_to_set(List, Set) :-
    list_to_set(List, Set, []).       
list_to_set([], Set, Set).
list_to_set([H|T], Set, Acc) :-
    (member(H, Acc) ->
        list_to_set(T, Set, Acc)
    ;
        list_to_set(T, Set, [H|Acc])).

% Test your code
:- initialization main.

main :-
    suggest(pat, Movie), 
    writeln(Movie),
    halt.

kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: my-pod
spec:
  affinity:
    nodeAffinity:
      requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
        nodeSelectorTerms:
        - matchExpressions:
          - key: kubernetes.io/hostname
            operator: In
            values:
            - node-1
            - node-2
        - matchExpressions:
          - key: node-role.kubernetes.io/worker
            operator: Exists
        - matchExpressions:
          - key: my-label-key
            operator: In
            values:
            - my-label-value
      preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
      - weight: 50
        preference:
          matchExpressions:
          - key: my-other-label-key
            operator: In
            values:
            - my-other-label-value
    podAffinity:
      preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
      - weight: 100
        podAffinityTerm:
          labelSelector:
            matchExpressions:
            - key: my-label-key
              operator: In
              values:
              - my-label-value
          topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
    podAntiAffinity:
      requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
      - labelSelector:
          matchExpressions:
          - key: my-label-key
            operator: In
            values:
            - my-label-value
        topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
      - weight: 100
        podAffinityTerm:
          labelSelector:
            matchExpressions:
            - key: my-label-key
              operator: In
              values:
              - my-label-value
          topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
  containers:
  - name: my-container
    image: nginx
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80

% 初始化变量
r = 1000; % 电阻值
c = 1e-6; % 电容值
fs = 44100; % 采样率
y_prev = 0; % 前一时刻的输出值
y = []; % 输出数组

% 模拟输入数据
x = randn(1, 100); % 随机生成 100 个数据

% 在线滤波
for i = 1:length(x)
    [y_i, y_prev] = digital_lowpass_rc_filter_online(x(i), y_prev, r, c, fs);
    y = [y y_i];
end

cadenaDeAmigos :: RedSocial -> Usuario -> Usuario -> [Usuario] -> [Usuario] -> Bool
cadenaDeAmigos red us1 us2 visitados [] = False 
cadenaDeAmigos red us1 us2 visitados (f:friends) | f == us2 = True
                                                 | pertenece f visitados = cadenaDeAmigos red us1 us2 visitados friends
                                                 | otherwise = cadenaDeAmigos red us1 us2 (f:visitados) (amigosDe red f) || cadenaDeAmigos red us1 us2 visitados friends

version: "3"
   services:
     db:
       image: mariadb
       command: --transaction-isolation=READ-COMMITTED --binlog-format=ROW
       restart: always
       volumes:
         - "./mariadb-data:/var/lib/mysql"
       environment:
         MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: yourpassword
         MYSQL_USER: erpnext
         MYSQL_PASSWORD: erpnext
         MYSQL_DATABASE: erpnext
     redis-cache:
       image: redis:latest
       command: redis-server --appendonly yes
       restart: always
     redis-queue:
       image: redis:latest
       command: redis-server --appendonly yes
       restart: always
     erpnext-python:
       build: .
       restart: always
       depends_on:
         - db
         - redis-cache
         - redis-queue
       volumes:
         - "./erpnext:/home/frappe/frappe-bench"
       ports:
         - "8000:8000"
       tty: true

version: '3'
services:
  web:
    image: frappe/erpnext-worker:m1-beta
    ports:
      - "8000:8000"
      - "9000-9100:9000-9100"
    environment:
      - DB_ROOT_USER=root
      - DB_ROOT_PASSWORD=<YourRootPasswordHere>
      - SITES=erpnext.local
      - SITES_PATH=/erpnext/sites
      - WORKER_CLASS=gevent
      - FRAPPE_ERP_NEXT_VERSION=beta
    volumes:
      - ~/Desktop/BerkimpireHathaway:/erpnext/sites
      - bench-assets-vol:/assets
      - redis-vol:/redis-socket
    depends_on:
      - db
      - redis-cache
      - redis-queue
    links:
      - db
      - redis-cache
      - redis-queue
  worker-long:

      - SITES_PATH=/erpnext/sites

    volumes:
      - ~/Desktop/BerkimpireHathaway:/erpnext/sites

    depends_on:

% Palindrome predicates
is_palindrome(Str) :- string_lower(Str, LowerStr), is_palindrome_helper(LowerStr).

is_palindrome_helper([]).
is_palindrome_helper([_]).
is_palindrome_helper(Str) :-
    string_chars(Str, Chars),
    reverse(Chars, ReversedChars),
    Chars = ReversedChars.

% Test case for palindrome
test :-
    is_palindrome("Racecar"),
    is_palindrome("madam"),
    \+ is_palindrome("hello"),
    \+ is_palindrome("world").

not_in_list([], L2, X) :- 
    member(X, L2).
not_in_list([H|T], L2, X) :-
    not(member(H, L2)),
    not_in_list(T, L2, X).
not_in_list([H|_], L2, X) :- 
    member(H, L2),
    not_in_list([H], L2, X).

%Поиск свободных номеров по определенным параметрам
available_rooms(RoomType, RoomCapacity, RoomsList, AvailableRooms) :-
    findall(Room, (member(Room, RoomsList), RoomType = Room.type, 
                   RoomCapacity =< Room.capacity, is_room_available(Room.number)), AvailableRooms).

%Проверка, свободен ли номер на заданные даты
is_room_available(RoomNumber) :-
    bookings(Bookings),
    \+ (member(Booking, Bookings),
        RoomNumber = Booking.room_number,
        overlap_dates(Booking.check_in, Booking.check_out, "03.09.2021", "07.09.2021")).

%Проверка пересечения дат
overlap_dates(Date1_start, Date1_end, Date2_start, Date2_end) :-
    date(Date1_start, Date1_end, Date1_length),
    date(Date2_start, Date2_end, Date2_length),
    Date1_length + Date2_length > (max(Date1_end, Date2_end) - min(Date1_start, Date2_start)).
    
%Вычисление разницы между датами    
date(D1, D2, Length) :-
    parse_time(D1, '%d.%m.%Y', T1),
    parse_time(D2, '%d.%m.%Y', T2),
    Length is div(T2-T1, 86400).

%Поиск бронирований для заданного клиента
client_bookings(ClientName, BookingsList) :-
    bookings(AllBookings),
    findall(Booking, (member(Booking, AllBookings), ClientName = Booking.client_name), BookingsList).

%Поиск свободного номера и бронирование его для клиента
book_room(ClientName, RoomNumber, CheckInDate, CheckOutDate) :-
    rooms(Rooms),
    available_rooms(_, _, Rooms, AvailableRooms),
    member(Room, AvailableRooms),
    RoomNumber = Room.number,
    bookings(Bookings),
    \+ (member(Booking, Bookings),
        Booking.room_number = RoomNumber,
        overlap_dates(Booking.check_in, Booking.check_out, CheckInDate, CheckOutDate)),
    assertz(booking(ClientName, Room.hotel_id, Room.number, CheckInDate, CheckOutDate)),
    writeln("Номер забронирован!").

%Отмена бронирования
cancel_booking(ClientName) :-
    bookings(Bookings),
    member(Booking, Bookings),
    ClientName = Booking.client_name,
    retract(booking(ClientName, Booking.hotel_id, Booking.room_number, Booking.check_in, Booking.check_out)),
    writeln("Бронирование отменено!").

%Поиск гостеприимства на заданный номер
find_guest(RoomNumber, GuestName) :-
    bookings(Bookings),
    member(Booking, Bookings),
    RoomNumber = Booking.room_number,
    GuestName = Booking.client_name.

%Проверка, свободен ли номер на заданные даты
is_room_available(RoomNumber, CheckInDate, CheckOutDate) :-
    bookings(BookingsList),
    \+ is_room_booked(RoomNumber, CheckInDate, CheckOutDate, BookingsList).

is_room_booked(RoomNumber, CheckInDate, CheckOutDate, [booking(_, _, RoomNumber, BookedInDate, BookedOutDate)|_]) :-
    overlap_dates(CheckInDate, CheckOutDate, BookedInDate, BookedOutDate);
    is_room_booked(RoomNumber, CheckInDate, CheckOutDate, BookingsList).
         
is_room_booked(RoomNumber, CheckInDate, CheckOutDate, [_|BookingsList]) :-
    is_room_booked(RoomNumber, CheckInDate, CheckOutDate, BookingsList).

%Поиск свободного номера и бронирование его для клиента
book_room(ClientName, RoomNumber, CheckInDate, CheckOutDate) :-
    rooms(Rooms),
    find_available_room(Rooms, RoomNumber, CheckInDate, CheckOutDate),
    assertz(booking(ClientName, Room.hotel_id, Room.number, CheckInDate, CheckOutDate)),
    writeln("Номер забронирован!").

find_available_room([], _, _, _) :- fail.
find_available_room([Room|Rooms], RoomNumber, CheckInDate, CheckOutDate) :-
    Room.number = RoomNumber,
    is_room_available(RoomNumber, CheckInDate, CheckOutDate),
    !.

find_available_room([Room|Rooms], RoomNumber, CheckInDate, CheckOutDate) :-
    find_available_room(Rooms, RoomNumber, CheckInDate, CheckOutDate).

%Отмена бронирования
cancel_booking(ClientName) :-
    retract(booking(ClientName, HotelID, RoomNumber, CheckInDate, CheckOutDate)),
    writeln("Бронирование отменено!").

%Поиск гостеприимства на заданный номер
find_guest(RoomNumber, GuestName) :-
    bookings(Bookings),
    find_guest_in_bookings(RoomNumber, Bookings, GuestName).

find_guest_in_bookings(RoomNumber, [booking(GuestName, _, RoomNumber, _, _)|_], GuestName) :- !.

find_guest_in_bookings(RoomNumber, [_|Bookings], GuestName) :-
    find_guest_in_bookings(RoomNumber, Bookings, GuestName).

%Проверка пересечения дат
overlap_dates(Date1_start, Date1_end, Date2_start, Date2_end) :-
    date(Date1_start, Date1_end, Date1_length),
    date(Date2_start, Date2_end, Date2_length),
    Date1_length + Date2_length > (max(Date1_end, Date2_end) - min(Date1_start, Date2_start)).

%Вычисление разницы между датами
date(D1, D2, Length) :-
    parse_date(D1, Day1, Month1, Year1),
    parse_date(D2, Day2, Month2, Year2),
    Days1 is Day1 + (Month1-1)*31 + (Year1-1900)*372,
    Days2 is Day2 + (Month2-1)*31 + (Year2-1900)*372,
    Length is Days2 - Days1.

%Парсинг даты
parse_date(Date, Day, Month, Year) :-
    atom_chars(Date, [D1, D2, '.', M1, M2, '.', Y1, Y2, Y3, Y4]),
    number_codes(Day, [D1, D2]),
    number_codes(Month, [M1, M2]),
    number_codes(Year, [Y1, Y2, Y3, Y4]).

% правило бронирования номера
book(Room) :-
    available(Room),
    asserta(reserved(Room)).

% правило отмены бронирования номера
cancel(Room) :-
    retract(reserved(Room)),
    asserta(available(Room)).

% правила для проверки наличия номеров
available(single) :- available(101).
available(double) :- available(201).
available(suite) :- available(301).

version: '2'
services:
  zookeeper1:
    image: zookeeper
    restart: always
    hostname: zoo1
    container_name: zoo1
    ports:
      - "2181:2181"
      - "2888:2888"
      - "3888:3888"
    environment:
      ZOO_MY_ID: 1
      ZOO_SERVERS: server.1=zoo1:2888:3888 server.2=zoo2:2888:3888 server.3=zoo3:2888:3888
  zookeeper2:
    image: zookeeper
    restart: always
    hostname: zoo2
    container_name: zoo2
    ports:
      - "2182:2181"
      - "2889:2888"
      - "3889:3888"
    environment:
      ZOO_MY_ID: 2
      ZOO_SERVERS: server.1=zoo1:2888:3888 server.2=zoo2:2888:3888 server.3=zoo3:2888:3888
  zookeeper3:
    image: zookeeper
    restart: always
    hostname: zoo3
    container_name: zoo3
    ports:
      - "2183:2181"
      - "2890:2888"
      - "3890:3888"
    environment:
      ZOO_MY_ID: 3
      ZOO_SERVERS: server.1=zoo1:2888:3888 server.2=zoo2:2888:3888 server.3=zoo3:2888:3888

version: '3'

services:
  zookeeper:
    image: zookeeper
    deploy:
      replicas: 3
      placement:
        constraints: [node.role == manager]
    ports:
      - "2181:2181"
      - "2888:2888"
      - "3888:3888"

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: zk-cluster
spec:
  serviceName: "zk"
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: zk
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: zk
    spec:
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      containers:
        - name: zk
          image: zookeeper
          ports:
            - name: client
              containerPort: 2181
            - name: quorum
              containerPort: 2888
            - name: leader-election
              containerPort: 3888
          env:
            - name: ZOO_MY_ID
              value: "0"
            - name: ZOO_SERVERS
              value: server.1=zookeeper-0.zk-headless:2888:3888 server.2=zookeeper-1.zk-headless:2888:3888 server.3=zookeeper-2.zk-headless:2888:3888
          volumeMounts:
            - name: datadir
              mountPath: /data
      volumes:
        - name: datadir
          persistentVolumeClaim:
            claimName: datadir

-module(server).
-export([start/1]).

% c(server).
% server:start(central).

start(Server) -> register(Server,spawn(fun() -> loop([]) end)).

loop(Users) ->
    receive
        {From, stop} -> 
            NewUsers = lists:delete(From, Users),
            io:format("Received from ~p message to stop! Removing from user's list~n",[From]),
            From ! {self(), server_disconnect},
            loop(NewUsers);
        {From, Msg} -> 
            io:format("Received ~p: ~p~n",[From,Msg]),
            io:format("Sending reply and forwarding message to other users...~n"),
            case lists:member(From, Users) of
                false -> NewUsers = [From | Users];
                true -> NewUsers = Users
            end,
            forward_message_to_users(Msg, NewUsers, From),
            From ! {self(), happy_to_receive_your_message},
            loop(NewUsers)
    end.

forward_message_to_users(_, [], _) ->
    ok;
forward_message_to_users(Message, [User | Rest], Sender) ->
    case User /= Sender of
        true ->
            User ! {Sender, Message};
        false ->
            ok
    end,
    forward_message_to_users(Message, Rest, Sender).

-module(client).
-export([start/1,add_remote/1,send_msg/4,stop_client/1]).

start(Client) -> 
    register(Client,spawn(fun() -> loop() end)),
    spawn(fun() -> message_listener(Client) end).

% c(client).
% client:start(elsa).
% client:add_remote('server1@LAPTOP-FELLF17T').

%client:send_msg(elsa,central,'server1@LAPTOP-FELLF17T',ola).

% c(client).

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% 
%  Interface to client  %
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%Add remote machine to known ones.
add_remote(RemoteMachine) ->
    net_adm:ping(RemoteMachine).
% Sends Message
send_msg(Client,Server,RemoteMachine,Message)->
    Client ! {send,Server,RemoteMachine,Message}.
% Stop client
stop_client(Client) ->
    Client ! {stop_client}.

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% 
%      Main loop        %
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
loop() ->
    receive
        {send,Server,RemoteMachine,Message} ->
            {Server,RemoteMachine} ! {self(),Message},
            loop();
        {stop_client} ->
            io:format("Cliente exiting...~n"),
            exit(normal)
    end.

message_listener(Client) ->
    receive
        {Sender, Message} ->
            io:format("~p received from ~p~n", [Message, Sender]),
            message_listener(Client)
    end.

forward_message_to_users(_, [], _) ->
    ok;
forward_message_to_users(Message, [User | Rest], Sender) ->
    case User /= Sender of
        true ->
            User ! {registered_name(Sender), Message};
        false ->
            ok
    end,
    forward_message_to_users(Message, Rest, Sender).

registered_name(Pid) ->
    case erlang:process_info(Pid, registered_name) of
        {registered_name, Name} -> Name;
        _ -> Pid
    end.

-module(server).
-export([start/1]).

% c(server).
% server:start(central).

start(Server) -> register(Server,spawn(fun() -> loop([]) end)).

loop(Users) ->
    receive
        {From, stop} -> 
            NewUsers = lists:keydelete(From, 1, Users),
            io:format("Received from ~p message to stop! Removing from user's list~n",[From]),
            From ! {self(), server_disconnect},
            loop(NewUsers);
        {From, Msg} -> 
            io:format("Received ~p: ~p~n",[From,Msg]),
            io:format("Sending reply and forwarding message to other users...~n"),
            {NewUsers, UpdateOccurred} = update_users_list(Users, From),
            case UpdateOccurred of
                true -> From ! {self(), server_message_received};
                false -> ok
            end,
            forward_message_to_users(Msg, NewUsers, From),
            loop(NewUsers)
    end.

update_users_list(Users, Pid) ->
    case lists:keyfind(Pid, 1, Users) of
        {Pid, _} -> {Users, false};
        false ->
            {[(Pid, registered_name(Pid)) | Users], true}
    end.

registered_name(Pid) ->
    case erlang:process_info(Pid, registered_name) of
        {registered_name, Name} -> Name;
        _ -> Pid
    end.

forward_message_to_users(_, [], _) ->
    ok;
forward_message_to_users(Message, [{UserPid, UserName} | Rest], Sender) ->
    case UserPid /= Sender of
        true ->
            UserPid ! {registered_name(Sender), Message};
        false ->
            ok
    end,
    forward_message_to_users(Message, Rest, Sender).

fact(Fact) :-
    fact(Fact, [], AllFacts),
    select(Fact, AllFacts, _).  % backtrack through the list of all possible facts

fact(Fact, Acc, AllFacts) :-
    ( Fact = [Rel, Arg1, Arg2],
      has(Arg1, SuperArg),
      SuperFact = (Rel, SuperArg, Arg2),
      \+ member(SuperFact, Acc)  % avoid duplicates
    -> fact(SuperFact, [SuperFact | Acc], AllFacts)  % recursive call
    ;  AllFacts = Acc
    ).

fact(Fact) :-
    Fact.
fact(Fact) :-
    Fact =.. [Rel, Arg1, Arg2],
    isa(Arg1,SuperArg),
    SuperFact =.. [Rel, SuperArg, Arg2],
    fact(SuperFact).

fact(Fact) :-
    Fact.
fact(Fact) :-
    Fact =.. [ Rel, Argl, Arg2],
    isa(Argl,SuperArg),
    SuperFact =.. [ Rel, SuperArg, Arg2],
    fact(SuperFact).

booking(RoomNumber, ClientName, DateFrom, DateTo):-
  room(RoomNumber, _, Price, not_booked),
  write('Room # '), write(RoomNumber), write(' is booked for '),
  write(ClientName), write(' from '), write(DateFrom),
  write(' to '), write(DateTo), write('. The price is '),
  write(Price), write(' rubles.'), nl,
  retract(room(RoomNumber, RoomType, Price, not_booked)),
  asserta(room(RoomNumber, RoomType, Price, booked(ClientName, DateFrom, DateTo))).
 
unbooking(RoomNumber):-
  room(RoomNumber, RoomType, Price, booked(ClientName, DateFrom, DateTo)),
  retract(room(RoomNumber, RoomType, Price, booked(ClientName, DateFrom, DateTo))),
  asserta(room(RoomNumber, RoomType, Price, not_booked)).
 
registerCheckIn(ClientName, PassportId, RoomNumber, DateIn):-
  room(RoomNumber, _, Price, booked(ClientName, _, DateTo)),
  write('Guest '), write(ClientName),
  write(' with Passport ID '), write(PassportId),
  write(' is registered for check-in in room #'),
  write(RoomNumber), write(' from '), write(DateIn),
  write(' to '), write(DateTo), write('. The price is '),
  write(Price), write(' rubles.'), nl.
 
getRoomService(RoomNumber, ServiceType, Price):-
  room(RoomNumber, _, _, booked(ClientName, _, _)),
  write('Room service for room #'), write(RoomNumber),
  write(' type '), write(ServiceType),
  write(' is ordered by '), write(ClientName),
  write('. The price is '), write(Price), write(' rubles.'), nl.

@startuml
actor User
participant "Video Player" as VP
participant "Streaming Server" as SS
participant "RTSP Server" as RS
participant "HLS Server" as HS
User -> VP : open video player
activate VP
VP -> SS : connect to streaming server
activate SS
SS -> RS : send RTSP request
activate RS
RS --> SS : RTSP response
deactivate RS
SS -> VP : display video
deactivate SS
User -> VP : adjust video settings
VP -> SS : send setting request
SS -> RS : send setting request
RS --> SS : setting response
SS -> VP : apply settings
User -> VP : close video player
VP -> SS : stop playback
SS -> RS: send TEARDOWN request
RS --> SS: response
deactivate RS
deactivate VP
@enduml

# 编译器命令
CC=gcc
# 编译器标志
CFLAGS=-Wall -g
# 可执行文件名称
TARGET=hello

# 默认目标
all: $(TARGET)

# 编译可执行文件
$(TARGET): hello.o
    $(CC) $(CFLAGS) -o $(TARGET) hello.o

# 编译hello.c
hello.o: hello.c
    $(CC) $(CFLAGS) -c hello.c

# 清除生成的文件
clean:
    $(RM) $(TARGET) *.o

name: Build and Test

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v2

      - name: Set up Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v2
        with:
          node-version: 14

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: yarn install

      - name: Run tests
        run: yarn test

      - name: Build app
        run: yarn build

name: DevSparrow CI/CD

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout repository
      uses: actions/checkout@v2

    - name: Set up Python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v2
      with:
        python-version: 3.9

    - name: Install dependencies
      run: |
        python -m pip install --upgrade pip
        pip install -r requirements.txt

    - name: Run tests
      run: |
        python -m unittest discover tests

    - name: Build and package
      run: |
        ./scripts/build/generate_docs.sh
        ./scripts/build/installer_builder.sh
        ./scripts/build/release_builder.sh

    - name: Upload artifacts
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v2
      with:
        name: DevSparrow
        path: |
          bin/windows/DevSparrow.exe
          installer/DevSparrow_Installer.exe

GB28181_Server -> RTSP_Server : 录像回放请求
RTSP_Server -> GB28181_Server : 录像回放数据
GB28181_Server -> Video_Player : 录像回放数据
Video_Player -> User : 播放后的录像数据

get(Prop, Object) :-
    frame(name(Object), _, Properties, _),
    (  \+ member(isa(noInherit(Props)), Properties)
    ;  \+ member(Prop, Props)),
    (  member(Prop, Properties) -> true
    ;   frame(name(Object), isa(Parent), _, _),
        get(Prop, Parent)).

get(Prop, Object) :-
    frame(name(Object), _, _, Defaults),
    \+ isDeniedInherit(Prop, Object),
    member(Prop, Defaults).

name: Run Tests

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - master
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - master

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - name: Setup Node.js environment
        uses: actions/setup-node@v2.4.1
        with:
          node-version: 12
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          cd frontend
          npm ci
          cd ../backend
          npm ci
      - name: Run tests
        run: |
          cd frontend
          npm test
          cd ../backend
          npm test

isa(animal),

[]).

get(Prop,Object):- % если задано конкретное свойство - ищем только в самом объекте
frame(name(Object),,List_of_properties,_),
member(Prop,List_of_properties).
get(Prop,Object):- % иначе ищем сначала в списке свойств объекта, затем в списке по умолчанию, не учитывая наследование
frame(name(Object),,List_of_properties,List_of_defaults),
not(member(Prop,List_of_properties)), % проверяем, что свойство не задано явно
member(Prop,List_of_defaults).
get(Prop,Object):- % если не нашли свойство в данном объекте, ищем у его родителя, но не учитываем наследование, если свойство задано явно
frame(name(Object),isa(Parent),,_),
not(get(Prop,Object)), % проверяем, что свойство не найдено в текущем объекте
get(Prop,Parent).

# ======================== Elasticsearch Configuration =========================

# 集群名称
cluster.name: my-cluster

# 节点名称
node.name: my-node-1

# 用于集群发现的节点
discovery.seed_hosts: ["node1.example.com", "node2.example.com"]

# 节点所在的主机名/IP听的http端口
network.host: 192.168.1.10
http.port: 9200

# 与集群相关的配置项
# Skip join and discovery altogether in favor of a seed list
# vs. Elasticsearch's curated master election
discovery.type: single-node

# 数据和日志路径
path.data: /var/lib/elasticsearch
path.logs: /var/log/elasticsearch

# ===================== 以上为基础配置 ==========================

# ES集群中和Master节点相连的HTTP端口
#
#transport.tcp.port: 9300

# 限制JVM堆内存的大小。默认是1GB
#
#-Xms1g
#-Xmx1g

# 分配给每个请求的最大内存。默认100mb
#
#http.max_content_length: 100mb

# 集群节点不能接受到来自`localhost`和`0:0:0:0:0:0:0:1`的请求。
# A misconfigured firewall might cause requests to be blocked or the machine
# running Elasticsearch might be accessible over a network interface that
# we are not aware of. If you have this problem, you need to explicitly tell
# Elasticsearch that it can bind to more addresses:

# 允许节点接受来自所有地址的请求
#
#network.host: 0.0.0.0

# 控制读写操作重试次数和超时时间
#
#index.max_retries: 3
#index.retry_on_conflict: 5
#index.write.wait_for_active_shards: 1

# 数据备份和恢复配置
#
#path.repo: ["/mnt/backups", "/mnt/second_backups"]

-module(table_division_par_sept).
-export([main/0]).

main() ->
    io:format("La table de division par 7 jusqu'à 10 est la suivante :~n"),
    afficher_table(1).

afficher_table(11) ->
    ok;
afficher_table(N) ->
    Resultat = N * 7,
    io:format("~w / 7 = ~w~n", [Resultat, N]),
    afficher_table(N+1).

-module(div_by_seven).

-export([start/0]).

start() ->
    io:fwrite("Table de division par 7 jusqu'à 10:\n"),
    table(1).

table(N) when N =< 10 ->
    Result = N*7,
    io:fwrite("~B x 7 = ~B\n", [N, Result]),
    table(N+1);
    
table(_N) ->
    ok.

loop through j = coin[1] to amount (j=8 to 10)
         ways[j] = ways[j] + ways[j - coin[1]]

         **When j=8:
            ways[8] = ways[8] + ways[8-8] = 1 + 1 = 2
         **When j=9:
            ways[9] = ways[9] + ways[9-8] = 1 + 1 = 2
         **When j=10:
            ways[10] = ways[10] + ways[10-8] = 1 + 1 = 2

      Resulting ways array: [1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 2, 2]

loop through j = coin[1] to amount (j=8 to 21) 
      ways[j] = ways[j] + ways[j - coin[1]]

      **When j=8:
         ways[8] = ways[8] + ways[8-8] = 1 + 1 = 2
      **When j=9:
         ways[9] = ways[9] + ways[9-8] = 1 + 1 = 2
      **When j=10:
         ways[10] = ways[10] + ways[10-8] = 1 + 1 = 2

(defun c:roundcoords (/ ss ent)
  (setq ss (ssget)) ; 选择所有对象
  (if ss
    (progn
      (setq nents (sslength ss))
      (setq i 0)
      (repeat nents
        (setq ent (ssname ss i))
        (setq i (1+ i))
        (setq ent (entget ent))
        (cond
          ((= "POLYLINE" (cdr (assoc 0 ent))) ; 多段线
            (setq verts (cdr (assoc 10 ent))) ; 获取顶点列表
            (setq j 0)
            (repeat (/ (length verts) 2)
              (setq x (nth (* j 2) verts))
              (setq y (nth (1+ (* j 2)) verts))
              (setq x (* 0.5 (round (/ x 0.5))))
              (setq y (* 0.5 (round (/ y 0.5))))
              (setq x (truncate (* x 2)))
              (setq y (truncate (* y 2)))
              (setq x (/ x 2.0))
              (setq y (/ y 2.0))
              (setq verts (subst x (* j 2) verts))
              (setq verts (subst y (1+ (* j 2)) verts))
              (setq j (1+ j))
            )
            (entmod (subst (cons 10 verts) (assoc 10 ent) ent)) ; 更新顶点列表
          )
          ((= "LINE" (cdr (assoc 0 ent))) ; 直线
            (setq x1 (cdr (assoc 10 ent)))
            (setq y1 (cdr (assoc 20 ent)))
            (setq x2 (cdr (assoc 11 ent)))
            (setq y2 (cdr (assoc 21 ent)))
            (setq x1 (* 0.5 (round (/ x1 0.5))))
            (setq y1 (* 0.5 (round (/ y1 0.5))))
            (setq x2 (* 0.5 (round (/ x2 0.5))))
            (setq y2 (* 0.5 (round (/ y2 0.5))))
            (setq x1 (truncate (* x1 2)))
            (setq y1 (truncate (* y1 2)))
            (setq x2 (truncate (* x2 2)))
            (setq y2 (truncate (* y2 2)))
            (setq x1 (/ x1 2.0))
            (setq y1 (/ y1 2.0))
            (setq x2 (/ x2 2.0))
            (setq y2 (/ y2 2.0))
            (entmod (subst (cons 10 x1) (assoc 10 ent)
                    (subst (cons 20 y1) (assoc 20 ent)
                    (subst (cons 11 x2) (assoc 11 ent)
                    (subst (cons 21 y2) (assoc 21 ent) ent))))) ; 更新坐标值
          )
        )
      )
      (princ (strcat "\n" (itoa nents) " objects processed.")) ; 输出处理结果
    )
    (princ "\nNo objects selected.") ; 如果没有选择任何对象，输出提示信息
  )
  (princ)
)

- alias: 'Turn on lights when Roomba starts cleaning at night'
  trigger:
    platform: state
    entity_id: vacuum.roomba
    to: 'cleaning'
  condition:
    condition: and
    conditions:
      - condition: sun
        after: sunset
      - condition: state
        entity_id: light.living_room
        state: 'off'
  action:
    service: light.turn_on
    entity_id: light.living_room

- alias: 'Turn off lights when Roomba is done cleaning'
  trigger:
    platform: state
    entity_id: vacuum.roomba
    to: 'docked'
  condition:
    condition: state
    entity_id: light.living_room
    state: 'on'
  action:
    service: light.turn_off
    entity_id: light.living_room

- alias: 'Turn on light when Roomba starts cleaning after sunset'
  trigger:
    platform: or
    - platform: state
      entity_id: vacuum.roomba
      to: 'cleaning'
    - platform: state
      entity_id: vacuum.roomba
      to: 'on'
      from: 'off'
      for: '00:05:00'
  condition:
    condition: sun
    after: sunset
  action:
    service: switch.turn_on
    entity_id: switch.light_switch

- alias: 'Turn on lights 1 hour before sunset'
  trigger:
    platform: sun
    event: sunset
    offset: "-01:00:00"
  action:
    service: switch.turn_on
    entity_id: switch.light_switch

MOV CX, 0          ; 初始化CX为0

CMP AX, BX         ; 比较AX和BX的值
JL smaller         ; 如果AX < BX，跳转到smaller标签
JG larger          ; 如果AX > BX，跳转到larger标签
JMP equal          ; 如果AX == BX，跳转到equal标签

smaller:
    ; AX < BX，输出"AX is smaller than BX"
    MOV DX, offset smaller_msg ; DX指向消息字符串
    MOV AH, 9       ; 将9存入AH中，表示打印字符串
    INT 21h         ; 打印消息
    JMP end         ; 跳转到程序结束

larger:
    ; AX > BX，输出"AX is larger than BX"
    MOV DX, offset larger_msg ; DX指向消息字符串
    MOV AH, 9       ; 将9存入AH中，表示打印字符串
    INT 21h         ; 打印消息
    JMP end         ; 跳转到程序结束

equal:
    ; AX == BX，输出"AX is equal to BX"
    MOV DX, offset equal_msg ; DX指向消息字符串
    MOV AH, 9       ; 将9存入AH中，表示打印字符串
    INT 21h         ; 打印消息

end:
    ; 程序结束
    MOV AH, 4Ch
    INT 21h

smaller_msg:
    DB 'AX is smaller than BX$'

larger_msg:
    DB 'AX is larger than BX$'

equal_msg:
    DB 'AX is equal to BX$'

mixedS_back=mixedS;                  
MixedS_mean=zeros(2,1);
for q=1:2
    MixedS_mean(q)=mean(mixedS(q,:));  %计算均值
end                                      

for q=1:2
    for j=1:size(mixedS,1)
        mixedS(q,j)=mixedS(q,j)-MixedS_mean(q);
    end
end
s_cov=cov(mixedS');%求协方差
[E,D]=eig(s_cov);%特征值分解
whitening=inv(sqrt(D))*(E)'; %白化矩阵
s_whitening=whitening*mixedS;%白化后的信号矩阵
s_I=cov(s_whitening');%单位阵

module your_design_module(input clk, input data, input [1:0] addr, output reg [7:0] out_data);

  reg [7:0] mem_data [0:1];  //这里我们声明了一个长度为2，每个元素为8位的数组来模拟LPM_RAM_DP的行为

  //实例化LPM_RAM_DP模块
  LPM_RAM_DP #(
    .DATA_WIDTH(8),
    .TOTAL_SIZE(16),
    .BYTE_WRITE_EN("TRUE"),
    .SIM_COLLISION_CHECKING("TRUE")
  ) ram (
    .data_a_in(data),         //将输入数据连到data_a_in口
    .addr_a(addr[0]),         //将第0位地址作为寄存器1的地址
    .we_a(data != 1'bZ),      //只有在数据为非高阻态时才允许写操作
    .data_a_out(mem_data[0]), //将寄存器1的数据连到data_a_out口
    .data_b_out(mem_data[1]), //将寄存器2的数据连到data_b_out口
    .addr_b(addr[1]),         //将第1位地址作为寄存器2的地址
    .we_b(data != 1'bZ),      //同上
    .clock(clock),            //将时钟信号连到LPM_RAM_DP的时钟口
    .q(out_data)              //将输出数据连到LPM_RAM_DP的输出口
  );

endmodule

A = [2 -0.1 -0.2; 0.1 7 -0.3; 0.3 -0.2 10];
b = [7.85; -19.3; -71.4];
x = [0; 0; 0]; % sıfır tahmin
omega = 1.2; % rahatlatma faktörü
maxit = 3; % maksimum iterasyon sayısı

for k = 1:maxit
    % x'in güncellenmesi
    for i = 1:length(b)
        x(i) = (b(i) - A(i,1:i-1)*x(1:i-1) - A(i,i+1:end)*x(i+1:end)) / A(i,i);
        x(i) = omega * x(i) + (1-omega) * x(i); % rahatlatma faktörü
    end
end

lb = [1e-4 1e-4 1e-4 1e-4 1e-4]; % 下边界
ub = [2e-1 2e-1 2e-1 500 500]; % 上边界
range = ub - lb; % 每个参数的取值范围
popsize = 5; % 种群大小

pop = zeros(popsize, 5); % 初始化种群二维数组，每行代表一个个体，每列代表一个参数

for i = 1:popsize
    pop(i,1:3) = rand(1,3) .* range(1:3) + lb(1:3); % 生成前三个参数
    pop(i,4:5) = rand(1,2) .* range(4:5) + lb(4:5); % 生成后两个参数
end

command /random <text>:
    description: Включает или отключает получение случайных предметов
    usage: /random (on|off)
    trigger:
        if arg 1 is "off":
            set {random.%player%} to false
            send action bar "&cВы отключили рандомные предметы" to player for 5 seconds
        else if arg 1 is "on":
            set {random.%player%} to true
            send action bar "&aВы включили рандомные предметы" to player for 5 seconds
        else:
            send "Используйте &c/random (on|off)&f для включения или отключения рандомных предметов."

name: CI

on:
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: windows-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
        with:
          submodules: "recursive"
      
      - name: clone dev2
        uses: actions/checkout@v3
        with:
          repository: "ignite720/dev2"

      - name: Setup premake
        uses: abel0b/setup-premake@v2.2
        with:
          version: "5.0.0-beta2"

      - name: Add msbuild to PATH
        uses: microsoft/setup-msbuild@v1.1
        with:
          vs-version: "latest"
        
      - name: Build app for release
        run: |
          premake5 vs2022
          msbuild build\VEngine-wks.sln -nologo -p:Configuration=Release /p:Platform=x64 /p:Projects="build\VEngine\VEngine.vcxproj"
          
      - name: Move dev2 to D://
        run: |
          move D:\a\dev2 D:\

CC = gcc
LD = ld
CFLAGS = -c -Wall
LDFLAGS = -L/path/to/static/libs
LIBS = -lmylib
TARGET = myprogram
SRCS = main.c util.c

OBJS = $(SRCS:.c=.o)

$(TARGET): $(OBJS)
	$(LD) $(LDFLAGS) $(OBJS) -o $(TARGET) $(LIBS)

%.o: %.c
	$(CC) $(CFLAGS) $< -o $@

clean:
	rm -f $(OBJS) $(TARGET)

Клиент --> Риэлтер: Заполнение документов
Клиент --> Риэлтер: Отправка заполненных документов
Риэлтер --> Клиент: Проверка запроса
Риэлтер --> Клиент: Отправка результата проверки
Риэлтер --> Клиент: Учет платежей
Риэлтер --> Клиент: Выдача документов

Актеры: Арендатор, Риэлтер

1. Арендатор -> Риэлтер: Запрос на услуги по купле-продаже или аренде недвижимости
2. Риэлтер -> Риэлтер: Проверка доступной недвижимости и предложение
3. Риэлтер -> Арендатор: Предложение недвижимости
4. Арендатор -> Риэлтер: Отправка документов
5. Риэлтер -> Риэлтер: Проверка правильности документов
6. Риэлтер -> Риэлтер: Создание договора
7. Риэлтер -> Арендатор: Отправка договора
8. Арендатор -> Риэлтер: Подписание и оплата
9. Риэлтер -> Риэлтер: Регистрация платежей
10. Риэлтер -> Риэлтер: Передача документов
11. Риэлтер -> Актер: Выдача документов
12. Актер -> Риэлтер: Получение документов
13. Риэлтер -> Риэлтер: Завершение процесса

kind: Service

      port: 6379

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-application
spec:
  replicas: 3 # or any desired number of replicas
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: my-application
          image: your-application-image
          env:
            - name: REDIS_HOST
              value: redis-service # Replace with your Redis pod's service name
          ports:
            - containerPort: 8080

% 定义曲柄四杆机构参数
L1 = 8; % 连杆1的长度
L2 = 12; % 连杆2的长度
L3 = 10; % 连杆3的长度
theta = linspace(0, 2*pi, 100); % 角度范围
temp = linspace(0, pi, 100); % 中间变量

% 计算连杆4的x和y坐标
x4 = L2*cos(theta) + sqrt(L3^2-L2^2*sin(temp).^2).*cos(theta + atan(L2*sin(temp)./(L3-L2*cos(temp))));
y4 = L2*sin(theta) + sqrt(L3^2-L2^2*sin(temp).^2).*sin(theta + atan(L2*sin(temp)./(L3-L2*cos(temp))));

% 绘制曲柄四杆机构运动图形
figure
axis equal
for i = 1:length(theta)
    plot([0 L1*cos(theta(i))],[0 L1*sin(theta(i))],'r'); % 连杆1
    hold on
    plot([L1*cos(theta(i)) L1*cos(theta(i))+L2*cos(theta(i)+atan(L2*sin(temp(i))/(L3-L2*cos(temp(i)))))] ,...
        [L1*sin(theta(i)) L1*sin(theta(i))+L2*sin(theta(i)+atan(L2*sin(temp(i))/(L3-L2*cos(temp(i)))))] ,'g'); % 连杆2
    plot([L1*cos(theta(i))+L2*cos(theta(i)+atan(L2*sin(temp(i))/(L3-L2*cos(temp(i))))), x4(i)] ,...
        [L1*sin(theta(i))+L2*sin(theta(i)+atan(L2*sin(temp(i))/(L3-L2*cos(temp(i))))), y4(i)] ,'b'); % 连杆3
    plot([0 x4(i)] ,[0 y4(i)],'m'); % 连杆4
    hold off
    axis([-30 30 -30 30]) % 设置坐标轴范围
    pause(0.05) % 控制绘制的速度
end

    Properties:

      VpcId: !Ref MyVPC
      SecurityGroupIngress:
        - IpProtocol: tcp
          FromPort: 80
          ToPort: 80
          CidrIp: 0.0.0.0/0
      SecurityGroupEgress:
        - IpProtocol: -1
          CidrIp: 0.0.0.0/0

Outputs:
  MySecurityGroupId:
    Value: !Ref MySecurityGroup

Resources:
  MySecurityGroup:
    Type: AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup
    Properties:
      GroupDescription: Security Group for Amazon ECS Cluster
      VpcId: !Ref MyVPC
      SecurityGroupIngress:
        - IpProtocol: tcp
          FromPort: 80
          ToPort: 80
          CidrIp: 0.0.0.0/0
      SecurityGroupEgress:
        - IpProtocol: -1
          CidrIp: 0.0.0.0/0

  MyCluster:
    Type: AWS::ECS::Cluster
    Properties:
      ClusterName: MyECSCluster
      ClusterSettings:
        - Name: containerInsights
          Value: enabled
      CapacityProviders:
        - FARGATE

  MyCapacityProvider:
    Type: AWS::ECS::CapacityProvider
    Properties:
      Name: MyCapacityProvider
      AutoScalingGroupProvider:
        AutoScalingGroupArn: !Ref MyAutoScalingGroup
        ManagedScaling:
          Status: ENABLED
          TargetCapacity: 80
          MinimumScalingStepSize: 1
          MaximumScalingStepSize: 1000

      Tags:
        - Key: Name
          Value: MyCapacityProvider
      
  MyAutoScalingGroup:
    Type: AWS::AutoScaling::AutoScalingGroup
    Properties:
      # Auto Scaling group properties...

Outputs:
  MySecurityGroupId:
    Value: !Ref MySecurityGroup
  MyClusterArn:
    Value: !Ref MyCluster
  MyCapacityProviderArn:
    Value: !Ref MyCapacityProvider
  MyAutoScalingGroupArn:
    Value: !Ref MyAutoScalingGroup

# A模块的路径
A_MODULE_PATH = /home/wbv/rk3568/kos/ethernet/gp_module/
# B模块的路径
B_MODULE_PATH = /home/wbv/rk3568/kos/dcc_serial/

# A模块的目标文件和导出符号
A_MODULE_OBJ = $(A_MODULE_PATH)/a_module.o
A_MODULE_EXPORT_SYMBOLS = a_exported_symbol

# B模块的目标文件和依赖
B_MODULE_OBJ = $(B_MODULE_PATH)/b_module.o
B_MODULE_DEPENDENCIES = $(A_MODULE_OBJ)

# 编译规则
$(B_MODULE_OBJ): $(B_MODULE_PATH)/b_module.c $(B_MODULE_DEPENDENCIES)
    gcc -c $(B_MODULE_PATH)/b_module.c -o $(B_MODULE_OBJ)

# 链接规则
b_module: $(B_MODULE_OBJ)
    gcc $(B_MODULE_OBJ) $(A_MODULE_OBJ) -o b_module

.PHONY: clean

clean:
    rm -f $(B_MODULE_OBJ) b_module

# 定义变量
CC = gcc
CFLAGS = -Wall -Werror

# 定义目标及其依赖关系和命令
target: dependency1 dependency2
    $(CC) $(CFLAGS) -o target dependency1 dependency2

# 定义目标依赖关系
dependency1: source1.c
    $(CC) $(CFLAGS) -c source1.c -o dependency1

dependency2: source2.c
    $(CC) $(CFLAGS) -c source2.c -o dependency2

# 定义清理目标
clean:
    rm -f target dependency1 dependency2

---
- name: Install Chrony
  apt:
    name: chrony
    state: present
    update_cache: yes

- name: Configure Chrony
  template:
    src: chrony.conf.j2
    dest: /etc/chrony/chrony.conf
  notify: Restart chrony

- name: Enable and start Chrony service
  service:
    name: chrony
    state: started
    enabled: yes

- name: Synchronize host time with NTP servers
  command: chronyc makestep

---
- name: Playbook for managing NTP service
  hosts: your_hosts
  become: true

  tasks:
    - name: Install NTP package
      package:
        name: ntp
        state: present

    - name: Configure NTP servers
      template:
        src: ntp.conf.j2
        dest: /etc/ntp.conf
      notify: Restart NTP service

    - name: Enable and start NTP service
      service:
        name: ntp
        state: started
        enabled: yes

  handlers:
    - name: Restart NTP service
      service:
        name: ntp
        state: restarted

rho_w = 1; % 根据实际情况设定
theta_s = 1; % 根据实际情况设定
theta_w = 1; % 根据实际情况设定
d = 1; % 根据实际情况设定
ka = 1; % 根据实际情况设定

k_values = 1:10; % 定义k的范围

kf_values = zeros(size(k_values)); % 初始化kf的值

for i = 1:length(k_values)
    k = k_values(i);
    [kf, ~] = KF(rho_s, rho_w, theta_s, theta_w, d, ka, k);
    kf_values(i) = kf;
end

plot(k_values, kf_values, 'o-')
xlabel('k')
ylabel('kf')
title('k与kf的关系图')

rho_w = 45; %设置rho_w值
d = 1; %设置d值
ka = 1; %设置ka值
kf = 1; %设置kf值

k_vals = []; %创建空数组存储k值

for i=1:length(rho_s_vals)
    [K] = K(rho_s_vals(i),rho_w,d,ka,kf); %计算k值

plot(rho_s_vals, k_vals); %绘制二维曲线

SumABC =
   VAR CurrentPayer = table1[Payer]
   VAR CurrentSCU = table1[SCU]
   VAR CurrentMonthYear = table1[Month-Year]
   VAR FilteredData =
      FILTER (
        table1,
        table1[Payer] = CurrentPayer
            && table1[SCU] = CurrentSCU
            && table1[Month-Year] = CurrentMonthYear
      )
   RETURN
      CALCULATE (
         SUMX ( FilteredData, table1[A] )
            + SUMX ( FilteredData, table1[B] )
            + SUMX ( FilteredData, table1[C] )
      )

AllPeriods =
    VAR StartDates =
        CALCULATETABLE (
            VALUES ( 'Table'[StartDate] ),
            ALLEXCEPT ( 'Table', 'Table'[Client], 'Table'[Product] ),
            'Table'[StartDate] <= MAX ( 'Table'[Date] )
        )
    VAR EndDates =
        CALCULATETABLE (
            VALUES ( 'Table'[EndDate] ),
            ALLEXCEPT ( 'Table', 'Table'[Client], 'Table'[Product] ),
            'Table'[EndDate] >= MIN ( 'Table'[Date] )
        )
    RETURN
        SUMMARIZE (
            GENERATE (
                StartDates,
                EndDates,
                VAR StartDate = [StartDate]
                VAR EndDate = [EndDate]
                RETURN
                    CALENDAR ( StartDate, EndDate )
            ),
            'Table'[Client], 'Table'[Product], "PeriodStart", [Var1], "PeriodEnd", [Var2]
        )

.with_format(Json().json_schema(schema))
.with_schema(
    Schema()
    .field("field1", DataTypes.INT())
    .field("field2", DataTypes.STRING())
    .field("ts", DataTypes.TIMESTAMP(3))
    .rowtime(Rowtime().timestamps_from_field("ts").watermarks_periodic_bounded(60000))
)
.in_append_mode()
.register_table_source("kafka_source")

t_env.connect(

    .topic("output_topic")
    .property("bootstrap.servers", "your_bootstrap_servers")
)
.with_format(Json().json_schema(schema))
.with_schema(
    Schema()
    .field("field1", DataTypes.INT())
    .field("field2", DataTypes.STRING())
    .field("ts", DataTypes.TIMESTAMP(3))
    .field("result", DataTypes.STRING())
)
.in_append_mode()
.register_table_sink("kafka_sink")

SumOfDuration = 
CALCULATE(
    SUM(Table[Duration]),
    FILTER(
        Table,
        NOT (
            ISFILTERED(Table[MONTH])
            && ISFILTERED(Table[Promo])
            && COUNTROWS(
                FILTER(
                    Table,
                    EARLIER(Table[Customer]) = Table[Customer]
                    && EARLIER(Table[SKU]) = Table[SKU]
                    && EARLIER(Table[MONTH]) = Table[MONTH]
                    && EARLIER(Table[Promo]) = Table[Promo]
                )
            ) > 1
        )
    )
)

SumOfDuration = 
CALCULATE(
    SUM(Table[Duration]),
    FILTER(
        Table,
        COUNTROWS(
            FILTER(
                Table,
                EARLIER(Table[Customer]) = Table[Customer]
                && EARLIER(Table[SKU]) = Table[SKU]
                && EARLIER(Table[MONTH]) = Table[MONTH]
                && EARLIER(Table[Promo]) = Table[Promo]
            )
        ) = 1
    )
)

paths:
  /clients/{client_id}/payment-block:
    put:
      summary: Заблокировать платежи клиента
      parameters:
        - name: client_id
          in: path
          description: Идентификатор клиента
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: block_reason
          in: query
          description: Причина блокировки
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Платежи клиента успешно заблокированы
        '404':
          description: Клиент не найден
  /clients/{client_id}/payment-unblock:
    put:
      summary: Разблокировать платежи клиента
      parameters:
        - name: client_id
          in: path
          description: Идентификатор клиента
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Платежи клиента успешно разблокированы
        '404':
          description: Клиент не найден
  /clients/{client_id}/payment-block-status:
    get:
      summary: Проверить статус блокировки клиента
      parameters:
        - name: client_id
          in: path
          description: Идентификатор клиента
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Статус блокировки клиента успешно получен
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  is_blocked:
                    type: boolean
                  block_reason:
                    type: string
        '404':
          description: Клиент не найден

ORG 0x1000
START:
    MVI A, 0x06    ; Начальное значение регистра A равно 6 (430 Герц)
    LXI H, 0x0040  ; Начальные значения HL равны 40 (задержка)
    LXI B, 12      ; Количество частот и задержек в массиве
    LXI D, FREQ    ; Адрес начала массива частот

LOOP:
    ; Генерация звука
    OUT 0xFE       ; Запись значения регистра A в порт E
    XRA A          ; Инвертирование регистра A
    DCR H          ; Уменьшение значения регистра H на 1

    JNZ NEXT       ; Переход к следующей частоте, если H не равен 0

    ; Ожидание 1 секунды
    LXI H, 0x4E20  ; 0x4E20 x 0.5µs = 20,000µs = 1 секунда
WAIT:
    DCR H          ; Уменьшение значения регистра H на 1
    JNZ WAIT       ; Переход к метке WAIT, если H не равен 0

NEXT:
    INX D          ; Увеличение адреса массива на 1
    MOV A, M       ; Загрузка значения из массива частот в регистр A
    INX D          ; Увеличение адреса массива на 1
    MOV H, M       ; Загрузка значения из массива задержек в регистр H
    MVI L, 0       ; Загрузка значения 0 в регистр L

    DCX B          ; Уменьшение значения регистра B на 1
    JNZ LOOP       ; Переход к метке LOOP, если B не равен 0

    HLT            ; Остановка процессора

FREQ:
    DW 430, 750, 1070, 1390, 1710, 2030, 2350, 2030, 1710, 1390, 1070, 750

Структура данных Stack:
    размер - максимальный размер стека
    top - индекс вершины стека
    элементы - массив для хранения элементов стека

Процедура Empty(S: Stack) -> boolean:
    Если S.top равен -1, то
        Возвратить истину
    Иначе
        Возвратить ложь

Процедура Push(S: Stack, x: элемент):
    Если S.top равен S.размер минус 1, то
        Вывести сообщение об ошибке "Стек переполнен"
    Иначе
        Увеличить S.top на 1
        S.элементы[S.top] = x

Процедура Pop(S: Stack) -> элемент:
    Если Empty(S) равно истине, то
        Вывести сообщение об ошибке "Стек пуст"
    Иначе
        x = S.элементы[S.top]
        Уменьшить S.top на 1
        Возвратить x

Процедура StackTop(S: Stack) -> элемент:
    Если Empty(S) равно истине, то
        Вывести сообщение об ошибке "Стек пуст"
    Иначе
        Возвратить S.элементы[S.top]

Структура данных Node:
    data - значение элемента
    next - ссылка на следующий узел

Структура данных Stack:
    head - указатель на вершину стека

Процедура Empty(S: Stack) -> boolean:
    Если S.head равен нулю, то
        Возвратить истину
    Иначе
        Возвратить ложь

Процедура Push(S: Stack, x: элемент):
    Создать новый узел new_node
    new_node.data = x
    new_node.next = S.head
    S.head = new_node

Процедура Pop(S: Stack) -> элемент:
    Если Empty(S) равно истине, то
        Вывести сообщение об ошибке "Стек пуст"
    Иначе
        x = S.head.data
        S.head = S.head.next
        Возвратить x

Процедура StackTop(S: Stack) -> элемент:
    Если Empty(S) равно истине, то
        Вывести сообщение об ошибке "Стек пуст"
    Иначе
        Возвратить S.head.data
