@startuml
actor User
participant BookingSystem
participant FlightService
participant PaymentService

User -> BookingSystem: searchFlights(destination, date)
activate BookingSystem

BookingSystem -> FlightService: getAvailableFlights(destination, date)
activate FlightService
FlightService -> BookingSystem: flightOptions
deactivate FlightService

User -> BookingSystem: selectFlight(flightId)
activate BookingSystem

BookingSystem -> FlightService: reserveFlight(flightId)
activate FlightService
FlightService -> BookingSystem: reservationConfirmation
deactivate FlightService

User -> BookingSystem: makePayment(paymentDetails)
activate BookingSystem

BookingSystem -> PaymentService: processPayment(paymentDetails)
activate PaymentService
PaymentService -> BookingSystem: paymentConfirmation
deactivate PaymentService

BookingSystem -> User: bookingConfirmation
deactivate BookingSystem
@enduml

@startuml
!theme plain

title Travel Booking Website - Book Tickets Sequence Diagram

actor User as user
participant "Booking Website\nInterface" as website
participant "Flight Search\nSystem" as flightSystem
participant "Payment\nService" as paymentService
participant "Email\nService" as emailService

user -> website: Access booking site
alt logging in
    website -> user: Prompt for login
    user -> website: Enter credentials
    website -> website: Validate credentials
    alt valid credentials
        website -> user: Show main page
    else invalid credentials
        website -> user: Show error
    end
end

user -> website: Search for flights (origin, destination, date)
website -> flightSystem: Request available flights
activate flightSystem
flightSystem -> flightSystem: Search for flights
flightSystem -> website: Respond with flight options
deactivate flightSystem
website -> user: Display flight options

user -> website: Select flight and proceed to book
loop Seat Selection
    website -> user: Request seat selection
    user -> website: Select seat
end

website -> paymentService: Initiate payment
activate paymentService
paymentService -> website: Request payment details

website -> user: Ask for payment information
user -> website: Provide payment information
website -> paymentService: Send payment details
paymentService -> paymentService: Process payment
alt payment successful
    paymentService -> website: Confirm payment
    deactivate paymentService

    website -> emailService: Send confirmation email
    emailService -> user: Email ticket and receipt
    
    website -> user: Display booking confirmation
    deactivate website
    user -> website: Confirm receipt and log out
else payment failed
    paymentService -> website: Decline payment
    deactivate paymentService
    
    website -> user: Inform payment failure
    deactivate website
end

@enduml

@startuml
participant "User" as User
participant "Website Interface" as Interface
participant "Booking System" as Booking
participant "Payment Service" as Payment

User -> Interface : select destination and dates
activate Interface
Interface -> Booking : search flights
activate Booking
Booking -> Interface : list available flights
deactivate Booking

Interface -> User : display available flights
deactivate Interface
User -> Interface : choose flight
activate Interface

Interface -> Booking : book flight
activate Booking
Booking -> Booking : check availability
Booking -> Interface : confirm booking
deactivate Booking

Interface -> User : request payment details
deactivate Interface
User -> Interface : provide payment details
activate Interface

Interface -> Payment : process payment
activate Payment
Payment -> Payment : validate payment
Payment -> Interface : confirm transaction
deactivate Payment

Interface -> Booking : confirm booking with payment
activate Booking
Booking -> Booking : update seat availability
Booking -> Interface : generate tickets
deactivate Booking

Interface -> User : show tickets
deactivate Interface

@startuml
left to right direction

' Actors
actor "Traveler" as traveler
actor "Registered User" as reguser
actor "Guest User" as guestuser
actor "Payment System" as paymentsystem
actor "Hotel" as hotel
actor "Airline" as airline

' Use Cases
usecase UC1 as "Search for Flights"
usecase UC2 as "Book Flights"
usecase UC3 as "Search for Hotels"
usecase UC4 as "Book Hotels"
usecase UC5 as "Make Payments"
usecase UC6 as "Register/Login"
usecase UC7 as "Cancel Booking"
usecase UC8 as "View Itinerary"
usecase UC9 as "Write Reviews"

' Relationships and Associations
' Generalization between Registered and Guest Users
reguser -|> traveler
guestuser -|> traveler

' Include relationship (Payment is mandatory for booking)
UC2 .> UC5 : <<include>>
UC4 .> UC5 : <<include>>

' Extend relationship (optional actions)
UC6 ..> UC2 : <<extend>>
UC6 ..> UC4 : <<extend>>
UC7 ..> UC2 : <<extend>>
UC7 ..> UC4 : <<extend>>
UC8 ..> UC2 : <<extend>>
UC8 ..> UC4 : <<extend>>

' Associations (actors using the system)
traveler --> UC1
traveler --> UC3
reguser --> UC6
reguser --> UC7
reguser --> UC8
reguser --> UC2 : Optionally after login
guestuser --> UC2 : Without login
reguser --> UC4 : Optionally after login
guestuser --> UC4 : Without login
reguser --> UC9
hotel --> UC3
hotel --> UC4
airline --> UC1
airline --> UC2
paymentsystem --> UC5

@enduml

Search ..> BookFlight : <<include>>
Search ..> ReserveHotel : <<include>>
BookFlight ..> ProcessPay : <<include>>
ReserveHotel ..> ProcessPay : <<include>>
RegisterAcc --|> LoginLogout

version: "3.8" # Specifica la versione del formato docker-compose

services:
  db: # Questo è il servizio per il container MySQL
    image: mysql:5.7 # Utilizza l'immagine MySQL versione 5.7, puoi cambiare con l'ultima se preferisci
    container_name: db
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: my_secret_password
      MYSQL_DATABASE: app_db
      MYSQL_USER: db_user
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: db_user_pass
    restart: always
    ports:
      - "6033:3306" # Mappa la porta 6033 dell'host sulla porta 3306 del container

  phpmyadmin: # Questo è il servizio per il container phpMyAdmin
    image: phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin
    container_name: pma
    depends_on: 
      - db # Specifica che phpmyadmin dipende dal servizio db
    environment:
      PMA_HOST: db
      PMA_PORT: 3306
      PMA_ARBITRARY: 1
    restart: always
    ports:
      - "8081:80" # Mappa la porta 8081 dell'host sulla porta 80 del container

version: "3.8"

services:
  db:
    image: mysql:5.7
    container_name: db
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: my_secret_password
      MYSQL_DATABASE: app_db
      MYSQL_USER: db_user
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: db_user_pass
    restart: always
    ports:
      - "6033:3306"
    volumes:
      - shared_data:/var/lib/mysql
    networks:
      - backend_network

  phpmyadmin:
    image: phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin
    container_name: pma
    depends_on:
      - db
    environment:
      PMA_HOST: db
      PMA_PORT: 3306
      PMA_ARBITRARY: 1
    restart: always
    ports:
      - "8081:80"
    networks:
      - backend_network

  ftpserver:
    image: fauria/vsftpd
    container_name: ftp
    environment:
      FTP_USER: userftp
      FTP_PASS: userftppassword
      PASV_ADDRESS: localhost
      PASV_MIN_PORT: 21100
      PASV_MAX_PORT: 21110
    ports:
      - "21:21"
      - "21100-21110:21100-21110"
    volumes:
      - shared_data:/home/vsftpd
    networks:
      - backend_network
    restart: always

volumes:
  shared_data:

networks:
  backend_network:
    driver: bridge

010 - JNZ addr         ; Jump if zero flag is not set
011 - JC  addr         ; Jump if carry flag is set
100 - JNC addr         ; Jump if carry flag is not set

using Pkg

# Install the required packages if not already installed
Pkg.add("DecisionTree")
Pkg.add("CSV")
Pkg.add("DataFrames")
Pkg.add("Random")

using DecisionTree
using CSV
using DataFrames
using Random

# Set the seed for repeatability
Random.seed!(42)

# Read in the data
df = CSV.read("C:/Users/sande/Downloads/agaricus-lepiota.data", DataFrame, header = false)

# Rename the columns
col_names = ["poisonous", "cap-shape", "cap-surface", "cap-color", "bruises", "odor", "gill-attachment", "gill-spacing", "gill-size", "gill-color", "stalk-shape", "stalk-root",
"stalk-surface-above-ring", "stalk-surface-below-ring", "stalk-color-above-ring", "stalk-color-below-ring",
"veil-type", "veil-color", "ring-number", "ring-type", "spore-print-color", "population", "habitat"]
rename!(df, Symbol.(col_names))

# Convert categorical features to numerical using dummy encoding
for col in col_names
    df[!, col] = map(c -> pool(DataFrames.levels(df[!, col])) |> Dict -> Dict[c], df[!, col])
end

# Split the dataset into features and labels
features = Matrix(df[:, 2:end])  # All columns except the first (which is the target)
labels = df[:, 1]  # First column is the target (poisonous or not)

# Split into train and test sets
train_indices, test_indices = DecisionTree.partitioncollect(1:nrow(df), 0.7, shuffle=true)

train_features = features[train_indices, :]
train_labels = labels[train_indices]

test_features = features[test_indices, :]
test_labels = labels[test_indices]

# Train the decision tree classifier
model = DecisionTreeClassifier(max_depth=5)
DecisionTree.fit!(model, train_features, train_labels)

# Predict the classes for the test set
predictions = DecisionTree.predict(model, test_features)

# Evaluate the classifier
correct_predictions = sum(predictions .== test_labels)
accuracy = correct_predictions / length(test_labels)

println("Accuracy on test set: $accuracy")

# Optionally, print the tree
println("Learned Decision Tree:")
print_tree(model.tree)

version: '3.8' # 文件版本

services: # 定义服务

  web:
    image: example/my_web_app:latest # 使用的镜像
    ports:
      - "5000:5000" # 映射端口，格式为 "主机:容器"
    environment: # 设置环境变量
      - DEBUG=1

  db:
    image: postgres:13 # 使用PostgreSQL数据库镜像
    volumes:
      - db_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data # 数据持久化卷映射

@startuml
actor Customer as cust
participant "BookingInterface" as ui
participant "BookingService" as bs
participant "PaymentService" as ps
participant "AirlineService" as as

cust -> ui : selectFlightDetails()
ui -> bs : createBooking(flightDetails)
bs -> as : checkFlightAvailability(flightDetails)
as --> bs : flightAvailability(available)
alt if flight is available
    bs -> ps : processPayment(paymentDetails)
    ps --> bs : paymentConfirmation(successful)
    bs -> as : bookFlight(flightDetails)
    as --> bs : bookingConfirmation(ticket)
    bs --> ui : showBookingConfirmation(ticket)
    ui --> cust : displayTicket(ticket)
else flight not available
    bs --> ui : showUnavailableMessage()
    ui --> cust : displayUnavailable()
end
@enduml

@startuml
actor User as U
participant "Booking\nInterface" as B
participant "Payment\nService" as P
participant "Airline\nAPI" as A

U -> B: Select travel details
B -> A: Request available flights
A --> B: List of flights
U -> B: Select flight & provide payment info
B -> P: Request payment authorization
P --> B: Confirm transaction
B -> A: Confirm flight booking
A --> B: Ticket information
B -> U: Present ticket & booking confirmation

activate U
activate B
activate A
activate P

U -> B: Enter travel details
B -> A: Request available flights
A -> B: Return available flights
U -> B: Select a flight and enter payment details
B -> P: Process payment
P -> B: Return payment confirmation
B -> A: Book selected flight
A -> B: Confirm flight booking
B -> U: Provide booking confirmation

deactivate U
deactivate B
deactivate A
deactivate P

@enduml

whileIO :: IO Bool -> IO () -> IO ()
whileIO condition action = loop
  where
    loop = do
      cond <- condition
      if cond
        then action >> loop
        else return ()

      - POSTGRES_USER=sonar
      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=sonar_pass
      - POSTGRES_DB=sonar
    volumes:
      - postgresql_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    networks:
      - sonarnet

Spell Impact Modifier (SIM) = Base Stat Requirement of the spell / 100

Stat Reduction for Sapphire is affected by Spell Impact Modifier:
New Stat Value = Old Stat Value - (Old Stat Value * SIM)^(Age Difference)

Stat Increase for Lily is affected by Spell Impact Modifier:
New Stat Value = Old Stat Value + (Old Stat Value * SIM)^(Age Difference)

hens(4). % number of hens
chicks(8). % number of chicks
cats(12). % number of cats

possible_solution(Pigs, Horses, Cows) :-
    hens(Hens),
    chicks(Chicks),
    cats(Cats),
    
    % If the farmer has P pigs and there are three more pigs than horses,
    Pigs is Horses + 3,
    
    % There are enought hens for all the chicks and the farmer has 2 more horses than cows
    Horses is Cows + 2,
    
    % The farmer has 2 more cows than cats
    Cows is Cats + 2,
    
    % The total number of animals is 24
    Pigs + Horses + Cows + Hens + Chicks + Cats =:= 24.

opposite(e, w). % Define the opposite directions east and west
opposite(w, e).

valid_state(State) :-
    State = state(Farmer, Wolf, Goat, Cabbage), % Define the state variables
    valid_place(Farmer),
    valid_place(Wolf),
    valid_place(Goat),
    valid_place(Cabbage),
    Farmer = Goat. % Farmer must always be with the goat

valid_place(P) :-
    P = w; P = e. % Places can be either west or east

unsafe(state(Farmer, Wolf, Goat, Cabbage)) :-
    (Farmer \= Goat), (Farmer \= Wolf, Wolf = Goat); (Farmer \= Goat), (Farmer \= Cabbage, Goat = Cabbage).

move(state(A, A, G, C), move(w, w, G, C)). % Moving the wolf
move(state(A, W, A, C), move(w, W, G, C)). % Moving the goat
move(state(A, W, G, A), move(w, W, G, C)). % Moving the cabbage
move(state(A, W, G, C), move(w, W, G, C)). % Moving alone

move(state(A, W, G, C), move(e, W, G, C)). % Coming back

can_get_to(state(e, e, e, e), []). % Base case, all at east
can_get_to(State, [Move|RestOfSolution]) :-
    move(State, Move), can_get_to(Move, RestOfSolution), valid_state(Move).

% Define the valid states for the 'place' variable (w for west, e for east)
valid_place(w).
valid_place(e).

state(Farmer, Wolf, Goat, Cabbage) :-
    valid_place(Farmer),
    valid_place(Wolf),
    valid_place(Goat),
    valid_place(Cabbage),
    Farmer = Goat. % Restrict the farmer to always be with the goat

valid_position(F) :- F = east; F = west.

safe(state(F, W, G, C)) :-
    valid_position(F),
    valid_position(W),
    valid_position(G),
    valid_position(C),
    \+ ((W = G), (F \= G)), % Wolf and Goat together without farmer
    \+ ((G = C), (F \= G)). % Goat and Cabbage together without farmer

move(state(west, W, G, C), farmer_wolf, state(east, east, G, C)) :- safe(state(east, east, G, C)).
move(state(east, W, G, C), farmer_wolf, state(west, west, G, C)) :- safe(state(west, west, G, C)).

move(state(west, W, G, C), farmer_cabbage, state(east, W, G, east)) :- safe(state(east, W, G, east)).
move(state(east, W, G, east), farmer_cabbage, state(west, W, G, west)) :- safe(state(west, W, G, west)).

move(state(west, W, west, C), farmer_goat, state(east, W, east, C)) :- safe(state(east, W, east, C)).
move(state(east, W, east, C), farmer_goat, state(west, W, west, C)) :- safe(state(west, W, west, C)).

can_get(state(east, east, east, east)).
can_get(StateBefore) :- move(StateBefore, _, StateAfter), can_get(StateAfter).

<RatingBar
    android:id="@+id/rbRating" // Esta línea asigna un identificador único a la vista dentro del ámbito del archivo XML, permitiendo referenciar esta RatingBar desde el código Java/Kotlin.
    android:layout_width="wrap_content" // Define el ancho de la vista. "wrap_content" hace que la vista sea lo suficientemente grande como para encerrar su contenido más el padding especificado.
    android:layout_height="wrap_content" // Define la altura de la vista. Al igual que con el ancho, "wrap_content" ajusta la altura para que se ajuste al contenido de la vista.
    android:layout_marginBottom="10dp" // Añade un margen inferior a la vista. "dp" (píxeles independientes de la densidad) asegura que el margen tenga el mismo tamaño en diferentes densidades de pantalla.
    android:numStars="5" // Establece el número total de estrellas a mostrar en la barra de calificación. En este caso, se mostrarán 5 estrellas.
    android:rating="3" // Define la calificación inicial de la barra. Aquí se fija en 3, lo que significa que al mostrar la vista, se verá como si el usuario hubiera calificado con 3 estrellas.
    android:isIndicator="false" // Determina si la barra de calificación es solo un indicador (ver pero no tocar). "false" permite a los usuarios interactuar con ella, modificando la calificación.
    android:stepSize="0.5" // Define el incremento mínimo entre los valores de calificación. Aquí, "0.5" permite calificaciones como 3.5, permitiendo media estrella.
    android:progressTint="@color/design_default_color_primary" // Cambia el color de las estrellas seleccionadas (rellenadas). "@color/design_default_color_primary" refiere a un color definido en los recursos de la aplicación.
/>

<ProgressBar
    android:id="@+id/pbProcess" // ID único para identificar el componente ProgressBar.
    style="?android:attr/progressBarStyle" // Estilo predeterminado de ProgressBar (circular).
    android:layout_width="match_parent" // El ProgressBar ocupa todo el ancho disponible de su contenedor padre.

    android:layout_marginBottom="10dp"/> // Margen inferior de 10dp para separarlo de otros elementos.

.section .start
.global _start

_start:
    // 配置中断控制器
    // 初始化串口输出
    // 初始化内存管理单元（MMU）

    // 启动第一个核心（核心0）
    b core0_start

    // 启动其他核心（核心1、核心2等）
    core0_start:
        ldr sp, =core0_stack_top  // 设置栈顶指针
        mov r0, #0                // 参数0
        mov r1, #0                // 参数1
        mov r2, #0                // 参数2
        mov r3, #0                // 参数3
        bic r4, r4, r4            // Clear register r4
        bic r5, r5, r5            // Clear register r5
        bic r6, r6, r6            // Clear register r6
        bic r7, r7, r7            // Clear register r7

        // 设置运行模式和堆栈
        cps #0x13                 // 进入SVC模式
        mov r0, sp                // 设置栈指针
        mrs r1, cpsr
        ubfx r1, r1, #0, #5
        bfi  r1, #120, #3
        msr cpsr, r1              // 设置栈

        // 加载启动核心代码地址
        ldr r15, =core_start      // 跳转到启动核心代码地址

    core_start:
        // 初始化核心
        // 设置FPU、信号量等

        // 启动多核并跳转到内核入口
        ldr pc, =kernel_entry

.section .data
core0_stack_top:
    .space 4096 // 定义核心0的栈空间

.section .bss
    .align
    .space 4096 // 定义其他核心的栈空间

.section .text
kernel_entry:
    // 操作系统内核启动代码

apply_transforms(Node, Transformed) :-
       transform(Node, PartiallyTransformed),
       Node \= PartiallyTransformed, !,
       apply_transforms(PartiallyTransformed, Transformed).
   apply_transforms(Node, Transformed) :-
       Node =.. [Functor | Args],
       maplist(apply_transforms, Args, TransformedArgs),
       Transformed =.. [Functor | TransformedArgs].

   % Inference rule for addition

       type(Expr1, int),
       type(Expr2, int).

% Simple game loop outline
chess_game :-
    initialize_board(Board),
    display_board(Board),
    play_game(Board, white).

% Play game recursively switches between players
play_game(Board, Player) :-
    % Determine if the game is over (checkmate, stalemate, etc.)
    game_over(Board, Player), !,
    announce_winner(OppositePlayer).
play_game(Board, Player) :-
    write(Player), write(' to move.'),
    % Get all legal moves for the current Player
    legal_moves(Board, Player, Moves),
    % Choose one (this could be player input or AI decision-making)
    choose_move(Moves, Move),
    % Make the move, resulting in a new board state
    make_move(Board, Move, NewBoard),
    % Switch players

selectNApart :: Int -> [e] -> [e]
selectNApart n = go 0
  where
    go _ [] = []
    go i (x:xs)
      | i `mod` n == 0 = x : go (i+1) xs
      | otherwise = go (i+1) xs

postfixExpr :: String -> PostfixExpr
postfixExpr = head . foldl processToken [] . words
  where
    processToken (x:y:ys) "+" = (Add y x):ys
    processToken (x:y:ys) "-" = (Sub y x):ys
    processToken (x:y:ys) "*" = (Mul y x):ys
    processToken (x:xs) "uminus" = (Uminus x):xs
    processToken xs numStr = (Leaf (read numStr)):xs

data Test = Run (IO ()) | Skip (IO ())

runTests :: [Test] -> [IO ()]
runTests = map $ \t -> case t of
    Run test -> test
    Skip _ -> return ()

onlyTests :: [Test] -> [IO ()]
onlyTests tests = [action | Run action <- tests]

selectNApart n xs
  | n > 0 = case drop (n - 1) xs of

-- | Evaluates an expression tree given an association list for identifier lookup.
evalIdExpr :: IdExpr -> Assoc Int -> Int
evalIdExpr expr assoc = case expr of
  Id idStr    -> maybe 0 id (lookup idStr assoc)
  Leaf n      -> n
  Add e1 e2   -> evalIdExpr e1 assoc + evalIdExpr e2 assoc
  Sub e1 e2   -> evalIdExpr e1 assoc - evalIdExpr e2 assoc
  Mul e1 e2   -> evalIdExpr e1 assoc * evalIdExpr e2 assoc
  Uminus e    -> -evalIdExpr e assoc

evalIdExpr :: IdExpr -> Assoc Int -> Int
evalIdExpr (Id s) assoc = maybe 0 id (lookup s assoc)
evalIdExpr (Leaf n) _ = n
evalIdExpr (Add expr1 expr2) assoc = evalIdExpr expr1 assoc + evalIdExpr expr2 assoc
evalIdExpr (Sub expr1 expr2) assoc = evalIdExpr expr1 assoc - evalIdExpr expr2 assoc
evalIdExpr (Mul expr1 expr2) assoc = evalIdExpr expr1 assoc * evalIdExpr expr2 assoc
evalIdExpr (Uminus expr) assoc = -(evalIdExpr expr assoc)

testEvalIdExpr :: IO ()
testEvalIdExpr = do
  quickCheck $ \id1 val1 -> evalIdExpr (Id id1) [(id1, val1)] == val1
  quickCheck $ \id1 val1 -> evalIdExpr (Id id1) [(id1 ++ "x", val1)] == 0
  quickCheck $ \e1 e2 -> evalIdExpr (Add (Leaf e1) (Leaf e2)) [] == evalIdExpr (Add (Leaf e2) (Leaf e1)) []
  quickCheck $ \e1 e2 -> evalIdExpr (Mul (Leaf e1) (Leaf e2)) [] == evalIdExpr (Mul (Leaf e2) (Leaf e1)) []
  quickCheck $ \e1 e2 e3 -> evalIdExpr (Add (Add (Leaf e1) (Leaf e2)) (Leaf e3)) [] == evalIdExpr (Add (Leaf e1) (Add (Leaf e2) (Leaf e3))) []

% Connexions directes
troncon(1, 2).
troncon(2, 3).
troncon(3, 4).
troncon(4, 5).

% Prédicat pour les trajets directs
trajet_direct(X, Y) :- troncon(X, Y).

% Prédicat récursif pour trouver tous les trajets possibles, directs et via des étapes intermédiaires
trajet(X, Y) :- trajet_direct(X, Y). % Cas de base : lien direct
trajet(X, Y) :- trajet_direct(X, Z), trajet(Z, Y). % Cas récursif : trajet avec des étapes intermédiaires

% troncon_sol(Depart, Arrivee, Type).
troncon_sol(1, 2, terre).
troncon_sol(2, 3, terre).
troncon_sol(3, 4, bitume).
troncon_sol(4, 5, terre).
troncon_sol(5, 6, terre).

% Parcours direct uniquement sur terre
parcours_terre_direct(X, Y) :- troncon_sol(X, Y, terre).

% Parcours complet uniquement sur terre
parcours_terre(X, Y) :- parcours_terre_direct(X, Y). % Cas de base
parcours_terre(X, Y) :- parcours_terre_direct(X, Z), parcours_terre(Z, Y). % Cas récursif

% troncon(Depart, Arrivee, TypeSol).
troncon(1, 2, terre).
troncon(2, 3, terre).
troncon(3, 4, bitume).
troncon(4, 5, terre).
troncon(5, 6, terre).

% Parcours direct uniquement sur terre
parcours_terre_direct(X, Y) :- troncon(X, Y, terre).

% Parcours complet uniquement sur terre
parcours_terre(X, Y) :- parcours_terre_direct(X, Y). % Cas de base
parcours_terre(X, Y) :- parcours_terre_direct(X, Z), parcours_terre(Z, Y). % Cas récursif

% Cas de base: un seul tronçon est toujours de longueur impaire.
trajet_impair(X, Y) :- troncon(X, Y).

% Cas impaire: d'un point A à un point C à travers un point B implique un nombre impair de tronçons si et seulement si
% le nombre de tronçons entre A et B et entre B et C sont tous les deux pairs.
trajet_impair(X, Z) :-
    troncon(X, Y),
    troncon(Y, Z),
    not(trajet_impair(X, Y)),  % Assurez-vous que le trajet de X à Y est pair.
    not(trajet_impair(Y, Z)).  % Assurez-vous que le trajet de Y à Z est pair.

troncon(1, 2).
troncon(2, 3).
troncon(3, 4).
troncon(4, 5).
troncon(5, 6).
troncon(2, 6).
troncon(6, 7).

% Un trajet direct est un cas de base pour un trajet de randonnée.
trajet_direct(X, Y) :- troncon(X, Y).

% Un trajet avec un nombre impair de tronçons peut être constitué d'un trajet direct,
% ou d'un trajet qui commence par un tronçon, suivi par un autre trajet impair,
% “sautant” par-dessus un tronçon intermédiaire pour forcer l'impairité.
trajet_impair(X, Y) :- trajet_direct(X, Y).
trajet_impair(X, Y) :- troncon(X, Z), trajet_impair(Z, Y), X != Y.

troncon(1, 2).
troncon(2, 3).
troncon(3, 4).
troncon(4, 5).
%... et ainsi de suite.

% Un trajet direct est vu comme un tronçon, donc impair par définition.
trajet_impair(X, Y) :- troncon(X, Y).

% S'il existe un trajet_impair de X à Z, et un troncon de Z à Y (ou l'inverse), alors on peut considérer qu'il y a un trajet_impair de X à Y.
% Cela suppose implicitement une alternance qui pourrait conduire à un trajet total impair.
trajet_impair(X, Y) :- trajet_impair(X, Z), troncon(Z, Y).
trajet_impair(X, Y) :- troncon(X, Z), trajet_impair(Z, Y).

troncon(1, 2).
troncon(2, 3).
troncon(3, 4).
troncon(4, 1).  % Complète un circuit
troncon(2, 5).
troncon(5, 2).  % Circuit en 2 <-> 5

# 运行服务器
CMD ["gunicorn", "--bind", "0.0.0.0:8000", "your_project_name.wsgi:application"]

Grammar =
  Statement*

Statement =
  Assignment
| IfStatement
| Expression

Assignment =
  variable:'IDENT' '=' expr:Expression

IfStatement =
  'if' expr:Expression ':' block:Block ('else' ':' block:Block)?

Block =
  indent:'INDENT' statements:Statement+ dedent:'DEDENT'

Expression =
  Sum

Sum =
  term:Product (('+' term:Product) | ('-' term:Product))*

Product =
  factor:Atom (('*' factor:Atom) | ('/' factor:Atom) | ('%' factor:Atom))*

Atom =
  'NUMBER'
| 'STRING'
| variable:'IDENT'
| '(' expr:Expression ')'

character_profile:
  name: Illyasviel von Einzbern
  appearance:
    age: Younger than Fate/stay night counterpart
    eyes: Red
    hair: Long silver, resembling her mother Irisviel
    notable_outfits:
      - regular_school_uniform
      - summer_school_uniform
      - magical_girl_outfit_pink: After contracting with Magical Ruby
      - magical_girl_outfit_purple: While using Magical Sapphire, slightly different from Miyu's
      - zwei_form_outfit: Purplish color with cosmic-like wings, when wielding both Magical Ruby and Magical Sapphire
      - card_user_outfits: Varies, adjusts with the installation of Class Cards and the acquisition of various Heroic Spirits' outfits and equipment
    specific_transformation:
      saber_class_card_installation: Brings out a Princess Knight aspect rather than summoning King Arthur, Artoria Pendragon
  personality:
    general_attitude: Cheerful, positive, shy, easily flustered, innocent
    agility: Displayed during her first fight, but tends to be cowardly
    interests:
      - ardent_fan_of_anime
      - harbors_feelings_for_brother_Shirou
      - fascinated_by_maid_outfits except the official Einzbern maid outfit
    interaction_style:
      - acts_as_voice_of_reason among friends
      - responds_to_lewd_or_immoral_situations_with_tsukkomi_role
    growth: Matures into a strong individual willing to face overwhelming odds for her cares, maintaining innocence and strong morals
    desires: Wants to protect everyone, especially friends, and help Miyu and her world despite apparent impossibilities
    kindness: Considered a natural genius at befriending enemies
    childlike_behaviors:
      - childish tempers
      - trying_to_act_mature
      - stubbornness towards dislikes
    likes: Adores cute things like animals and stuffed toys, especially likes cats in contrast to her original version

        android:layout_marginStart="20dp" <!-- Using layout_marginStart instead of marginLeft -->

        android:layout_marginEnd="20dp" <!-- Using layout_marginEnd instead of marginRight -->
        android:layout_marginBottom="50dp"
        android:background="@drawable/image_outline"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" <!-- Constrained to the start of the parent -->
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" <!-- Constrained to the end of the parent -->
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" /> <!-- Constrained to the top of the parent -->

    <Button
        android:id="@+id/captureButton"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="Capture Image"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/topView" <!-- Constrained to the bottom of topView -->
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" <!-- Centered horizontally: start constraint -->
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" <!-- Centered horizontally: end constraint -->

1. If either date is null or empty, output "MISMATCH".
2. Normalize non-empty, valid dates to the YYYYMMDD format.
3. Remove all non-numeric characters from the normalized dates.

  containers:
  - name: myapp
    image: myapp-image
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /path/to
      name: myapp-volume
    livenessProbe:
      exec:
        command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        - /path/to/your/script.sh
      initialDelaySeconds: 30
      periodSeconds: 15
      timeoutSeconds: 5
      failureThreshold: 3
  volumes:
  - name: myapp-volume
    hostPath:
      path: /path/to
      type: Directory

version: '3.7'

services:
  mongo-config-1:
    image: mongo:latest
    command: mongod --configsvr --replSet configReplSet --bind_ip_all
    networks:
      - mongo-cluster

  mongo-config-2:
    image: mongo:latest
    command: mongod --configsvr --replSet configReplSet --bind_ip_all
    networks:
      - mongo-cluster

  mongo-config-3:
    image: mongo:latest
    command: mongod --configsvr --replSet configReplSet --bind_ip_all
    networks:
      - mongo-cluster

  mongos:
    image: mongo:latest
    depends_on:
      - mongo-config-1
      - mongo-config-2
      - mongo-config-3
    command: mongos --configdb configReplSet/mongo-config-1:27017,mongo-config-2:27017,mongo-config-3:27017 --bind_ip_all
    ports:
      - "27017:27017"
    networks:
      - mongo-cluster

  shard1-primary:
    image: mongo:latest
    command: mongod --shardsvr --replSet shard1ReplSet --dbpath /data/db --bind_ip_all
    volumes:
      - ./data/shard1-primary:/data/db
    networks:
      - mongo-cluster

  shard1-secondary-1:
    image: mongo:latest
    command: mongod --shardsvr --replSet shard1ReplSet --dbpath /data/db --bind_ip_all
    volumes:
      - ./data/shard1-secondary-1:/data/db
    networks:
      - mongo-cluster

  shard1-secondary-2:
    image: mongo:latest
    command: mongod --shardsvr --replSet shard1ReplSet --dbpath /data/db --bind_ip_all
    volumes:
      - ./data/shard1-secondary-2:/data/db
    networks:
      - mongo-cluster
  
  # Define shard2-primary, shard2-secondary-1, shard2-secondary-2, shard3-primary,
  # shard3-secondary-1, and shard3-secondary-2 similarly

networks:
  mongo-cluster:
    name: mongo-cluster
    driver: overlay

    command: mongod --configsvr --replSet configrs --port 27019
    volumes:
      - ./data/configdb2:/data/configdb
    networks:
      - mongo-cluster

  config3:
    image: mongo:4.4
    command: mongod --configsvr --replSet configrs --port 27019
    volumes:
      - ./data/configdb3:/data/configdb
    networks:
      - mongo-cluster

  # Mongos Router
  mongos:
    image: mongo:4.4
    depends_on:
      - config1
      - config2
      - config3
    command: mongos --configdb configrs/config1:27019,config2:27019,config3:27019 --bind_ip mongos --port 27017
    ports:
      - "27017:27017"
    networks:
      - mongo-cluster

  # Shard 1 Servers
  shard1-primary:
    image: mongo:4.4
    command: mongod --shardsvr --replSet shard1 --port 27018
    volumes:
      - ./data/shard1db1:/data/db
    networks:
      - mongo-cluster

  shard1-secondary:
    image: mongo:4.4
    command: mongod --shardsvr --replSet shard1 --port 27018
    volumes:
      - ./data/shard1db2:/data/db
    networks:
      - mongo-cluster

fibonacci_sublists([]).
fibonacci_sublists([_]).
fibonacci_sublists([_, _]).
fibonacci_sublists([A, B, C|T]) :-
    length(A, A_len),
    length(B, B_len),
    length(C, C_len),
    C_len is A_len + B_len,
    fibonacci_sublists([B, C|T]).

all_same_length([]).
all_same_length([_]).
all_same_length([X, Y | T]) :- length(X, L), length(Y, L), all_same_length([Y | T]).

same_length_sublists(List) :- all_same_length(List).

fibonacci_sublists([]).
fibonacci_sublists([_]).
fibonacci_sublists([_, _]).
fibonacci_sublists([A, B, C|T]) :-
    length(A, AL), length(B, BL), length(C, CL),
    CL is AL+BL,
    fibonacci_sublists([B, C|T]).

add_to_plus_expr(Expr, Expr) :- integer(Expr).
add_to_plus_expr(add(X, Y), PlusExpr) :-
    add_to_plus_expr(X, XExpr),
    add_to_plus_expr(Y, YExpr),
    PlusExpr = XExpr + YExpr.

named_to_op_expr(Expr, Expr) :- integer(Expr).
named_to_op_expr(add(X, Y), XExpr + YExpr) :-
    named_to_op_expr(X, XExpr),
    named_to_op_expr(Y, YExpr).
named_to_op_expr(mul(X, Y), XExpr * YExpr) :-
    named_to_op_expr(X, XExpr),
    named_to_op_expr(Y, YExpr).

named_expr_eval(Expr, Val) :- integer(Expr), Val = Expr.
named_expr_eval(add(X, Y), Val) :-
    named_expr_eval(X, XVal),
    named_expr_eval(Y, YVal),
    Val is XVal + YVal.
named_expr_eval(mul(X, Y), Val) :-
    named_expr_eval(X, XVal),
    named_expr_eval(Y, YVal),
    Val is XVal * YVal.

named_expr_to_prefix_tokens(N, [N]) :- integer(N).
named_expr_to_prefix_tokens(add(X, Y), [add|T]) :-
    named_expr_to_prefix_tokens(X, TX), named_expr_to_prefix_tokens(Y, TY), append(TX, TY, T).
named_expr_to_prefix_tokens(mul(X, Y), [mul|T]) :-
    named_expr_to_prefix_tokens(X, TX), named_expr_to_prefix_tokens(Y, TY), append(TX, TY, T).

#!/usr/bin/env -S swipl
%-*- mode: prolog; -*-

:- module(prj4_sol, [
      sublist_lengths/2,
      same_length_sublists/1,
      fibonacci_sublists/1,
      assoc_lookup/3,
      assoc_replace/3,
      add_to_plus_expr/2,
      named_to_op_expr/2,
      named_expr_eval/2,
      named_expr_to_prefix_tokens/2,
      op_expr_to_prefix_tokens/2
  ]).

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% sublist_lengths/2 %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

sublist_lengths([], []).
sublist_lengths([H|T], [Len|LT]) :- length(H, Len), sublist_lengths(T, LT).

:-begin_tests(sublist_lengths).
test(empty, [nondet]) :-
    sublist_lengths([], Lengths), Lengths = [].
test(sublist_lengths1, [nondet]) :-
    sublist_lengths([[a, b]], Lengths), Lengths = [2].
test(sublist_lengths3, [nondet]) :-
    sublist_lengths([[2], [a, b], [x, y, z]], Lengths), Lengths = [1, 2, 3].
test(sublist_lengths_var_list, [nondet]) :-
    sublist_lengths(List, [1, 2, 3]), length(List, 3).
:-end_tests(sublist_lengths).

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% same_length_sublists/1 %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

all_same_length([]).
all_same_length([_]).
all_same_length([X, Y | T]) :- length(X, L), length(Y, L), all_same_length([Y | T]).

same_length_sublists(List) :- all_same_length(List).

:-begin_tests(same_length_sublists).
test(empty, [nondet]) :-
    same_length_sublists([]).
test(empties, [nondet]) :-
    same_length_sublists([[], [], []]).
test(empties_fail, [fail]) :-
    same_length_sublists([[], [2], []]).
test(sublists1, [nondet]) :-
    same_length_sublists([[[a, 2]], [[]], [c]]).
test(sublists1_fail, [fail]) :-
    same_length_sublists([[a], [[]], [c, 2]]).
test(sublists3, [nondet]) :-
    same_length_sublists([[a, [2], 4], [b, 5, [1]], [3, 2, c]]).
test(sublists3_fail, [fail]) :-
    same_length_sublists([[a, 2, 4], [b, 5, 1], [3, [2, c]]]).
:-end_tests(same_length_sublists).


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% fibonacci_sublists/1 %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

fibonacci_sublists([]).
fibonacci_sublists([_]).
fibonacci_sublists([_, _]).
fibonacci_sublists([A, B, C|T]) :-
    length(A, AL), length(B, BL), length(C, CL),
    CL is AL+BL,
    fibonacci_sublists([B, C|T]).

:-begin_tests(fibonacci_sublists).
test(empty, [nondet]) :-
    fibonacci_sublists([]).
test(zero, [nondet]) :-
    fibonacci_sublists([[]]).
test(one, [nondet]) :-
    fibonacci_sublists([[], [a]]).
test(two, [nondet]) :-
    fibonacci_sublists([[], [a], [c]]).
test(three, [nondet]) :-
    fibonacci_sublists([[], [a], [c], [a, c]]).
test(three_fail, [fail]) :-
    fibonacci_sublists([[], [a], [c], [a, c, c]]).
test(four, [nondet]) :-
    fibonacci_sublists([[], [a], [c], [a, c], [1, 2, 3] ]).
test(four_fail, [fail]) :-
    fibonacci_sublists([[], [a], [c], [a, c], [1, 2, 3, 4] ]).
:-end_tests(fibonacci_sublists).

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% assoc_lookup/3 %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

assoc_lookup(Assoc, Key, Value) :- member((Key, Value), Assoc).

:-begin_tests(assoc_lookup).
test(empty, [fail]) :-
    assoc_lookup([], key, _Value).
test(first, [nondet]) :-
    assoc_lookup([(key, 42), (a, 22), (b, 33)], key, Value),
    42 = Value.
:-end_tests(assoc_lookup).

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% assoc_replace/3 %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

assoc_replace([], _, []).
assoc_replace([H|T], Assoc, [Z|ZT]) :-
    (atom(H) -> assoc_lookup(Assoc, H, Z); Z = H),
    assoc_replace(T, Assoc, ZT).

:-begin_tests(assoc_replace).
test(empty, [nondet]) :-
    assoc_replace([], [(a,22), (b, 33), (c, 42)], Z),
    Z = [].
:-end_tests(assoc_replace).

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% add_to_plus_expr/2 %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

add_to_plus_expr(Expr, Expr) :- integer(Expr).
add_to_plus_expr(add(X, Y), PlusExpr) :-
    add_to_plus_expr(X, XExpr),
    add_to_plus_expr(Y, YExpr),
    PlusExpr = XExpr + YExpr.

:-begin_tests(add_to_plus_expr).
test(int, [nondet]) :-
    add_to_plus_expr(42, Z), Z = 42.
:-end_tests(add_to_plus_expr).

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% named_to_op_expr/2 %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

named_to_op_expr(Expr, Expr) :- integer(Expr).
named_to_op_expr(add(X, Y), XExpr + YExpr) :-
    named_to_op_expr(X, XExpr),
    named_to_op_expr(Y, YExpr).
named_to_op_expr(mul(X, Y), XExpr * YExpr) :-
    named_to_op_expr(X, XExpr),
    named_to_op_expr(Y, YExpr).

:-begin_tests(named_to_op_expr).
test(int, [nondet]) :-
    named_to_op_expr(42, Z), Z = 42.
:-end_tests(named_to_op_expr).

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% named_expr_eval/2 %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

named_expr_eval(Expr, Val) :- integer(Expr), Val = Expr.
named_expr_eval(add(X, Y), Val) :-
    named_expr_eval(X, XVal),
    named_expr_eval(Y, YVal),
    Val is XVal + YVal.
named_expr_eval(mul(X, Y), Val) :-
    named_expr_eval(X, XVal),
    named_expr_eval(Y, YVal),
    Val is XVal * YVal.

:-begin_tests(named_expr_eval).
test(int, [nondet]) :-
    named_expr_eval(42, 42).
:-end_tests(named_expr_eval).

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% named_expr_to_prefix_tokens/2 %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

named_expr_to_prefix_tokens(N, [N]) :- integer(N).
named_expr_to_prefix_tokens(add(X, Y), [add|T]) :-
    named_expr_to_prefix_tokens(X, TX), named_expr_to_prefix_tokens(Y, TY), append(TX, TY, T).
named_expr_to_prefix_tokens(mul(X, Y), [mul|T]) :-
    named_expr_to_prefix_tokens(X, TX), named_expr_to_prefix_tokens(Y, TY), append(TX, TY, T).

:-begin_tests(named_expr_to_prefix_tokens).
test(int, [nondet]) :-
    named_expr_to_prefix_tokens(42, [42]).
:-end_tests(named_expr_to_prefix_tokens).

:-initialization(main, main).

% Hypothetical helper predicate that would need to exist to transform op expressions to named forms
% This is a placeholder for the idea and wouldn't work under strict restrictions
op_to_named_expr(X, X) :- integer(X).
op_to_named_expr(+(X, Y), add(NX, NY)) :-
    op_to_named_expr(X, NX),
    op_to_named_expr(Y, NY).
op_to_named_expr(*(X, Y), mul(NX, NY)) :-
    op_to_named_expr(X, NX),
    op_to_named_expr(Y, NY).

% Utilizing the defined named_to_op_expr and named_expr_to_prefix_tokens predicates indirectly
op_expr_to_prefix_tokens(OpExpr, PrefixTokens) :-
    op_to_named_expr(OpExpr, NamedExpr), % This step is hypothetical under current constraints
    named_expr_to_prefix_tokens(NamedExpr, PrefixTokens).

add_to_plus_expr(Expr, Expr) :- integer(Expr).
add_to_plus_expr(add(X, Y), PlusExpr) :-
   add_to_plus_expr(X, XExpr),
   add_to_plus_expr(Y, YExpr),
   PlusExpr =.. [+, XExpr, YExpr].

add_to_plus_expr(I, I) :- integer(I).

add_to_plus_expr(add(X, Y), Z) :-
    add_to_plus_expr(X, X1),
    add_to_plus_expr(Y, Y1),
    Z = (X1 + Y1).

op_expr_to_prefix_tokens(Expr, PrefixTokens) :-
    % Base case for integers
    integer(Expr), 
    !, 
    PrefixTokens = [Expr].
op_expr_to_prefix_tokens(Expr, PrefixTokens) :-
    % Handle expressions with + or *
    Expr =.. [Op, A, B],
    memberchk(Op, [+, *]),  % Ensure operation is either + or *
    op_expr_to_prefix_tokens(A, ATokens),
    op_expr_to_prefix_tokens(B, BTokens),
    append([[Op], ATokens, BTokens], PrefixTokens).

% Simplify the handling of integers and ensure they are directly represented.
op_expr_to_prefix_tokens(Expr, [Expr]) :- integer(Expr).

% Handle + and * by ensuring prefix notation is applied for each operation
% and recursively building the token list.
op_expr_to_prefix_tokens(Expr, PrefixTokens) :-
    Expr =.. [Op, Left, Right], % Decompose the expression
    member(Op, [+, *]), % Ensure Op is + or *
    op_expr_to_prefix_tokens(Left, LeftTokens),
    op_expr_to_prefix_tokens(Right, RightTokens),
    append([[Op], LeftTokens, RightTokens], PrefixTokens).

      app: myapp
  template:

  - 0.485

  - 0.406
  SEARCH:
    CENTER_JITTER: 3
    FACTOR: 4.0
    SCALE_JITTER: 0.25
    SIZE: 256
    NUMBER: 1
  STD:
  - 0.229
  - 0.224
  - 0.225
  TEMPLATE:
    CENTER_JITTER: 0
    FACTOR: 2.0
    SCALE_JITTER: 0
    SIZE: 128
  TRAIN:
    DATASETS_NAME:
    - COESOT
    DATASETS_RATIO:
    - 1
    SAMPLE_PER_EPOCH: 60000
  VAL:
    DATASETS_NAME:
    - COESOT_VAL
    DATASETS_RATIO:
    - 1

MODEL:
  PRETRAIN_FILE: "mae_pretrain_vit_base.pth"
  EXTRA_MERGER: False
  RETURN_INTER: False
  BACKBONE:
    TYPE: vit_base_patch16_224_ce
    STRIDE: 16
    CE_LOC: [3, 6, 9]
    CE_KEEP_RATIO: [1, 1, 1]
    CE_TEMPLATE_RANGE: 'CTR_POINT'
  HEAD:
    TYPE: CENTER
    NUM_CHANNELS: 256
TRAIN:
  BACKBONE_MULTIPLIER: 0.1
  DROP_PATH_RATE: 0.1
  CE_START_EPOCH: 0  # candidate elimination start epoch  20
  CE_WARM_EPOCH: 0  # candidate elimination warm up epoch 50
  BATCH_SIZE: 32
  EPOCH: 70  # 总Epochs(之前60+计划继续的10)
  GIOU_WEIGHT: 1     # 2.0
  L1_WEIGHT: 14      # 5.0
  FOCAL_WEIGHT: 1.0  # 1.5
  GRAD_CLIP_NORM: 0.1
  LR: 0.0001
  LR_DROP_EPOCH: 30
  NUM_WORKER: 8
  OPTIMIZER: ADAMW
  PRINT_INTERVAL: 50
  SCHEDULER:
    TYPE: CosineAnnealingLR
    T_MAX: 10  # 设置为计划训练的额外epochs
    ETA_MIN: 0.00001  # 可选，周期结束时的最小学习率
  VAL_EPOCH_INTERVAL: 2
  WEIGHT_DECAY: 0.0001
  AMP: False
TEST:
  EPOCH: 50
  SEARCH_FACTOR: 4.0
  SEARCH_SIZE: 256
  TEMPLATE_FACTOR: 2.0
  TEMPLATE_SIZE: 128

TRAIN:
  LR: 0.00005
  SCHEDULER:
    TYPE: CosineAnnealingLR
    T_MAX: 10
    ETA_MIN: 0.000005

TRAIN:
  LR_DROP_EPOCH: 60      # 新增：在第60个epoch再次降低学习率
  DECAY_RATE: 0.2        # 维持原有衰减率
  BATCH_SIZE: 32
  EPOCH: 60 + 10         # 更新总的训练epoch数为60+10
  ...
SCHEDULER:
  TYPE: step
  DECAY_RATE: 0.2        # 确保此处DECAY_RATE与TRAIN部分一致
  # 如果需要在额外的epoch中有多个降低点，可以考虑使用`Mstep`并设置MILESTONES
  # TYPE: Mstep
  # MILESTONES: [60]     # 这里设置在第60个epoch降低学习率
  # GAMMA: 0.2           # 指定降低比例

TRAIN:
  EPOCH: 70  # 将总的训练epoch数增加到70
  LR_DROP_EPOCH: [60]  # 借助于Mstep或类似可以设置多个下降点的调度器，设置降低点为第60个epoch
  ...
SCHEDULER:
  TYPE: Mstep  # 改为Mstep类型以允许多个明确的学习率变化点
  MILESTONES: [60]  # 在第60个epoch时降低学习率，适用于新增的10个epoch训练期间
  GAMMA: 0.2  # 选择一个适合的学习率衰减因子，例如在这里，新学习率=当前学习率*0.2

TRAIN:
  EPOCH: 60  # 确定总训练周期为60
  ...
SCHEDULER:
  TYPE: MultiStepLR  # 修改为MultiStepLR类型
  MILESTONES: [50]  # 在第50个epoch时降低学习率
  GAMMA: 0.2  # 学习率衰减因子，新学习率=当前学习率*0.2

MODEL:
  PRETRAIN_FILE: "mae_pretrain_vit_base.pth"  # 确保预训练模型与新架构兼容
  EXTRA_MERGER: False  # 根据新的Counter_Guide逻辑调整是否需要额外合并模块
  RETURN_INTER: True  # 如果新的Counter_Guide设计中包含了额外的中间特征返回，可能需要启用
  BACKBONE:
    TYPE: vit_base_patch16_224_ce  # 保持不变，前提是Counter_Guide是作为ViT的一部分被集成
    STRIDE: 16
    CE_LOC: [3, 6, 9]  # 根据新结构特性和性能测试结果可能需要重新评估
    CE_KEEP_RATIO: [1, 1, 1]  # 同上，根据模型性能调整
    CE_TEMPLATE_RANGE: 'CTR_POINT'  # 特征提取的范围，根据Counter_Guide逻辑调整是否需要修改

TRAIN:
  BACKBONE_MULTIPLIER: 0.1  # 保持不变或根据需要调整
  DROP_PATH_RATE: 0.2  # 考虑提高DropPath率以增强正则化
  CE_START_EPOCH: 5   # 如果新模型需要更快地适应，则可以提前开始CE策略
  CE_WARM_EPOCH: 10   # 提前结束CE的温暖期，适应新模型的快速学习需求
  BATCH_SIZE: 16  # 根据新模型的内存需求可能需要减小批次大小
  EPOCH: 50  # 保持不变
  LR: 0.0001  # 学习率可能需要细微调整
  LR_DROP_EPOCH: [30, 45]  # 采用更具体的学习率衰减策略
  SCHEDULER:
    TYPE: Mstep  # 采用分段常数衰减可能更适合新模型
    MILESTONES: [30, 45]
    GAMMA: 0.1

apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: redis-config
data:
  master.conf: |
    bind 0.0.0.0
    port 6379
  slave.conf: |
    bind 0.0.0.0
    port 6379
    slaveof redis-master 6379

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: redis-master
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis
      role: master
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: redis
        role: master
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: master
        image: redis:6.0
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 500Mi
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        volumeMounts:
        - name: config
          mountPath: /usr/local/etc/redis/redis.conf
          subPath: master.conf
        - name: data
          mountPath: /data
      volumes:
      - name: config
        configMap:
          name: redis-config
          items:
          - key: master.conf
            path: master.conf
      - name: data
        emptyDir: {}

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: redis-master
spec:
  ports:
  - port: 6379
  selector:
    app: redis
    role: master

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: redis-slave
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis
      role: slave
  replicas: 2  # 可以根据需要增减从节点数量
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: redis
        role: slave
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: slave
        image: redis:6.0
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 500Mi
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        volumeMounts:
        - name: config
          mountPath: /usr/local/etc/redis/redis.conf
          subPath: slave.conf
        - name: data
          mountPath: /data
      volumes:
      - name: config
        configMap:
          name: redis-config
          items:
          - key: slave.conf
            path: slave.conf
      - name: data
        emptyDir: {}

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: redis-slave
spec:

  selector:

      kind: prefix
      value: logstash-
    - filtertype: age

      direction: older
      timestring: '%Y.%m.%d'
      unit: days
      unit_count: 45

shardingRule:
  tables:
    your_table:
      actualDataNodes: ds.your_table_$->{2020..2023}
      tableStrategy:
        standard:
          shardingColumn: your_date_column
          preciseAlgorithmClassName: com.yourpackage.YearBasedShardingAlgorithm

sharding:
      shardingRule:
        tables:
          order:
            actualDataNodes: ds.order_$->{2020..2024}
            tableStrategy:
              standard:
                shardingColumn: orderDate
                preciseAlgorithmClassName: com.example.sharding.YearBasedShardingAlgorithm
                rangeAlgorithmClassName: com.example.sharding.YearBasedShardingAlgorithm
                # 这里的YearBasedShardingAlgorithm是你定义的分片算法

sharding:
  tables:
    order:
      actualDataNodes: ds.order_$->{2020..2024}
      tableStrategy:
        standard:
          shardingColumn: orderDate
          preciseAlgorithmExpression: order_$->{orderDate % 5 + 2020}

spring:
  shardingsphere:
    datasource:
      names: ds # 定义数据源名称
      ds: # 数据源详情配置
        type: com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource
        driver-class-name: com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver
        jdbc-url: jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/your_database?serverTimezone=UTC
        username: your_username
        password: your_password
    rules:
      sharding:
        tables:
          k_line_his_cn: # 分表的逻辑表名称
            actual-data-nodes: ds.k_line_his_cn_$->{1999..2023} # 定义实际的数据节点
            table-strategy:
              standard: # 定义分表策略
                sharding-column: date # 分片键
                sharding-algorithm-name: k_line_his_cn_by_year # 分片算法的名称
        sharding-algorithms:
          k_line_his_cn_by_year: # 分片算法的具体配置
            type: INLINE
            props:
              algorithm-expression: k_line_his_cn_$->{date.toInstant().atZone(ZoneId.systemDefault()).toLocalDate().getYear()}
              allow-range-query-with-inline-sharding: true

% 初始化提取后的像素值矩阵
extracted_pixels = zeros(size(img));

% 遍历ctrs中的每个标签值
for i = 1:length(ctrs)
    % 通过逻辑索引提取符合条件的像素值
    logical_matrix = imglabel == ctrs(i); % 生成布尔矩阵
    logical_matrix_expanded = repmat(logical_matrix, [1, 1, size(img,3)]); % 将布尔矩阵扩展为 m×n×3 的矩阵

    % 利用逻辑索引提取符合条件的像素值
    extracted_pixels(logical_matrix_expanded) = img(logical_matrix_expanded);
end

% extracted_pixels 中存储了根据 ctcs 中的标签值提取的像素值

{{Research}} {{I|Information regarding additional indentation with outlines is unverified and may be unreliable.|This article was machine-translated from another language and requires editing by a native speaker.|It is worth checking what happens if you specify a width value less than the size of the texture itself in the atlas - will it cut it off?}} ‘’‘fonts.dat’‘’ — this [[DAT|data file]] first appeared in [[GTA SA]] (Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas) and contains information about the “proportional values for fonts,” as referred to in Rockstar’s code comments. These settings allow characters to occupy varying amounts of space, making the text more compact and aesthetically pleasing. More details are described below. == Proportional values == [[File:SAPathNodes.png|thumb|450px|Colour-coded car path nodes for GTA: SA.]] ‘Proportional values’ are numerical values that define the width of each character in the ‘’‘fonts.txd’‘’ atlas, which contains all the font characters’ [[wikipedia:Sprite_(computer_graphics)|sprites]]. These values indicate the pixel distance from the left edge of the character to its right edge, including padding, which provides space for the subsequent character. Despite the tile width being 32 pixels, a proportional value can exceed this figure without encroaching on the next sprite in the [[wikipedia:Texture_atlas|texture atlas]]. In addition to the padding provided by proportional values, the text has additional spacing between characters, equivalent to the thickness of these characters’ outlines. In ‘’‘fonts.dat’‘’, the pixel distance for characters is applied at the scale they appear in the original ‘’‘fonts.txd’‘’, approximately 32 pixels in width and 39 in height, based on the texture atlas’s resolution of 512x512 pixels divided into 16 columns and 13 rows. ==Format== The file is in plain text format, allowing it to be opened with any text editor (like [[wikipedia:Microsoft Notepad|Notepad]]). Line comments are marked by the character # (number sign), and the inclusion of empty lines is permitted. == Application and Impact == The use of ‘’‘fonts.dat’‘’ in GTA SA was a significant development in the graphical presentation of in-game text, contributing to an improved user interface (UI) design. By enabling the alteration of character widths, the game could display text more dynamically, adjusting the layout based on the amount of on-screen information and enhancing readability. This approach has since influenced UI design in future video games, demonstrating the value of adaptable text rendering techniques for a polished player experience. Furthermore, modders have used ‘’‘fonts.dat’‘’ to customize and introduce new fonts into GTA SA, showcasing the game's versatility and the creativity of its community. Such modifications have included fonts that mimic those from other popular video games or cultural references, enriching the visual variety and personalization options available to players. == Tools == * {{GTAF|402942|GTA-IV/SA Water-IO Script for 3ds Max}} — by {{U|Gforce|Gforce}} == See also == * [[Data Files (San Andreas)]] {{SA-navi}}
